examples: (1) His landing is both swift and sure.(2) He made a remarkably swift recovery.(3) They've been very swift to deny these rumors.(4) With the failure of the peace talks, all hopes of a swift end to the war have flown out of the window.(5) She did a swift mental calculation.(6) feel a strong antagonism for sb(7) The Augustan age of English literature includes the writers Dryden, Swift and Pope.
(1) 他的落地既快又稳。(2) 他康复得相当快。(3) 他们在辟谣方面反应迅速。(4) 和谈失败后,迅速结束战争的希望都已化为乌有。(5) 她头脑里敏捷地盘算了一下。(7) 在英国文学的全盛时期 有德莱顿，斯威夫特和蒲柏等文豪。

translation: n.游泳adj.会游泳的；游泳的动词swim的现在分词.
examples: (1) Please keep the watch for me while I go swimming.(2) Swimming is the best way to tone up your body.(3) Next summer there will be a renewal of swimming.(4) That's not the place for you to practice swimming.
(1) 我去游泳，请代我保管这表。(2) 游泳是健体强身的最好方法。(3) 明年夏天游泳的热潮又会恢复。(4) 那里可不是你们练习游泳的地方。

translation: 游泳池
examples: (1) The boy received a bad scolding for cutting up in the swimming pool.(2) The boy slipped out of the room and headed for the swimming pool secretly.(3) The children ducked each other in the swimming pool.(4) There is a swimming pool in the park.
(1) 那孩子因在游泳池里胡闹而挨了一顿臭骂。(2) 这孩子偷偷摸摸地溜出了屋子，走向游泳池。(3) 孩子们在游泳池里互相把对方按入水中。(4) 公园里有一个游泳池。

translation: n.摇摆；改变；冲力；秋千v.摇摆；旋转；动摇
examples: (1) The swing of the ship made many people seasick.(2) The willow branches swing in the breeze.(3) I used to swing, but then age and good taste overtook me.(4) Tiny changes here can be felt in the backswing and lead to big improvements in the hit swing.(5) He took a swing at the tree with his axe.(6) The children are playing on the swings in the park.(7) This will swing public opinions against the government.(8) The children were swinging on a rope.(9) Watch me swing it around my head!(10) Two leaden balls, each at the end of a stiff pendulum, swing from a pole.(11) Can you swing them round to my point of view?

(1) 船的摇摆使许多人晕船。(2) 柳枝迎风摇摆。(3) 我原来喜欢赶时髦，后来随着年龄的增长和审美观的改变便不再那样了。(4) 这里在后摆时能够感受出来的很小的改变就可以让你在击球摆动上得到很大的进步。(5) 他挥斧砍树。(6) 孩子们在公园里荡秋千。(7) 这将使公共舆论转而反对政府。(8) 孩子们抓着绳子荡来荡去。(9) 看看我是怎样让它在我头上旋转！(10) 两个铅球，分别处在某个硬杆摆的末端，绕着一根柱子旋转。(11) 你能让他们转而支持我的观点吗？

translation: adj.瑞士的n.瑞士人
examples: (1) Millions were deposited in Swiss bank accounts.(2) The Swiss standard of living is high.(3) But the Swiss did not take their fate lying down.(4) The Swiss is a hardworking, frugal and neat people.
(1) 巨额款项存入了瑞士的银行账户。(2) 瑞士的生活费高。(3) 但是瑞士人并不甘心接受被征服的命运。(4) 瑞士人勤俭清洁。

translation: n.瑞士
examples: (1) Switzerland swept the board in the skiing competition.(2) How many countries border Switzerland?(3) Germany is bounded on the west by France and on the south by Switzerland.(4) Never having been to Switzerland before, he longs for a trip there.(5) Switzerland is famous for its watchmaking and beautiful scenery.
(1) 瑞士在滑雪比赛中囊括了所有的奖项。(2) 有多少国家与瑞士接壤?(3) 德国西面与法国接壤，南与瑞士为邻。(4) 因为从来没去过瑞士，他期待一趟瑞士之旅。(5) 瑞士以制表业和美丽的风景而闻名。

translation: n.转换；开关；鞭子v.改变；交换；转换；鞭打
examples: (1) How do I switch to the next major release branch?(2) The current will switch over after I push this button.(3) I wish to turn on the light, where is the switch?(4) In his hand he held a switch which was as supple as a vine-shoot and as heavy as iron.(5) No, hold it a second, switch that to roast chicken.(6) Our glasses have been switched--this is mine.(7) Nobody wants to switch back to the old system.(8) Do you mind if I switch the radio off?
(1) 如何转换为下个主要发布版本分支？(2) 我按下这个按钮之后，电流会被转换。(3) 我想要开亮那一支电灯,请问开关在哪儿?(4) 他手里拿着一条鞭子，象葡萄藤那样软，又象铁那么重。(5) 不，等一等，把那个换成烤子鸡。(6) 咱们的玻璃杯对调了－－这个是我的。(7) 谁也不希望回复到旧制度。(8) 我可以关掉收音机吗？

translation: n.剑；刀
examples: (1) He drove at her with his sword.(2) He is slashing wildly at his opponent with a sword.(3) The officer belted his sword on.(4) The robber thrust his sword through the traveler's bosom.
(1) 他用剑猛攻击她。(2) 他正用剑疯狂地朝对手乱砍。(3) 军官用皮带扣住佩刀。(4) 那强盗以刀刺穿了那旅客的胸部。

translation: n.符号；象征；标志
examples: (1) The chemical symbol for copper is "Cu".(2) The dove is the symbol of peace.(3) The river-sea dividing marker must be a symbol which separates the Yalu River from the Yellow Sea.
(1) 铜的化学符号是Cu。(2) 鸽子是和平的象征。(3) 江海分界碑,这里就是鸭绿江和黄海分界的标志吧。

translation: n.同情；同情心；同感；赞同；慰问
examples: (1) I felt much sympathy for the blind.(2) I have great sympathy for people in affliction.(3) The story stirred her sympathy.(4) You shouldn't trade on her sympathy.(5) I have a lot of sympathy for his opinions.(6) Many people are in sympathy with your views.(7) They sent me a letter of sympathy.
(1) 我对盲人深感同情。(2) 我对那些受苦受难的人们充满同情。(3) 这故事激起了她的同情心。(4) 你不应该利用她的同情心。(5) 我对他的意见深有同感。(6) 许多人赞同你的看法。(7) 他们寄给我一封慰问信。

translation: n.交响乐
examples: (1) The first movement of the symphony is beautiful.(2) I like listening to the symphony.
(1) 这部交响乐的第一乐章是很优美的。(2) 我喜欢听交响乐。

translation: n.症状；征兆
examples: (1) Cigarettes can aggravate the symptoms of a cold.(2) The doctor made his diagnosis after studying the patient's symptoms.(3) Fever is a symptom of many illnesses.
(1) 抽烟会加重感冒症状。(2) 医生研究病人的症状后, 作出诊断。(3) 发烧是许多疾病的症兆。

translation: n.系统；体系；身体；制度
examples: (1) The drainage system has been aged.(2) The magazine is produced using a desktop publishing system.(3) They are introducing a very sophisticated system for delivering information.(4) Excessive drinking does harm to the system.(5) She just blames it all on the system.
(1) 排水系统已经老化了。(2) 这本杂志用一个桌面的出版系统做出来的。(3) 他们正在介绍一个非常复杂的传递信息的体系。(4) 过度饮酒对身体有害。(5) 她把这全归咎于制度。

translation: adj.有系统的；分类的；体系的；有条理的
examples: (1) He is making a systematic study of the subject.(2) The school offered a systematic course in reading.(3) Science means systematic knowledge possessed as a result of practice and study.(4) The systematic organization of the larger teams will result in better efficiency.(5) He's very systematic in all he does.(6) She went about her work in a systematic and deliberate manner.
(1) 他在对那一科目作系统的研究。(2) 学校提供系统的阅读课程。(3) 科学是由于实践和研究的结果而获得的系统知识。(4) 构建大组制体系有利于提高效率。(5) 他做一切事情都很有条理。(6) 她干工作时有条理而不慌不忙。

translation: adj. 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）
examples: Her eyes moisten as she listen to the sad story.My heart broke at the sad news.Here we had, not long ago, a very sad funeral in this church.What deserves being thoughtful and sad when you are just a child?Don't spend too much time alone, or you'll feel sad.It made me sad to hear you have to go away.I'll be with you when you feel sad anytime.I'm sad you're leaving.
听著这悲伤的故事,她的眼睛湿润了。知道这悲伤的消息时不久以前,这教会举行了一次悲哀的丧礼。小小年纪,有什么值得你心事重重,满腹忧愁?别一个人呆得太久了,否则你会感到忧伤的。听到你非走不可，我觉得很伤心。不论什么时候,当你感到难过伤心的时候,我都将陪伴着你。你要走了

translation: adj. 安全的；可靠的；平安的n. 保险箱；冷藏室；纱橱n. (Safe)人名；(几)萨菲
examples: There is no safe landing on that coast.It is not safe to drive like that, you must slow down.The rescuers brought the climbers back safe and sound.The train is a safe means of transportation.They appointed a safe person as the new manager.All valuables should be kept in the safe.
那一带海岸没有安全的登陆处。那样开车是不安全的,你必须减速。救援人员把登山的人都安然无恙地救了回来。火车是一种安全可靠的交通工具。他们任命了一个谨小慎微的人担任新经理。所有贵重物品应存放在保险箱。

translation: n. 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
examples: The new car design incorporates all the latest safety features.The safety of the ship is the captain's responsibility.The management took all reasonable safety precautions.It's very important to teach the children about road safety.Put the money in the hotel safe for safety.
新的汽车设计具备最新安全措施的一切特点。确保船只的安全是船长的责任。管理部门采取了一切合理的安全措施。把交通安全常识教给孩子们是非常重要的。为保险起见，请把钱放到饭店的保险箱里。

translation: n. 女售货员，女店员
examples: The customer was angry with the salesgirl for her impolite answer.He repeated his address slowly so that the salesgirl could write it down.
那位顾客对女店员不客气的回答感到忿怒。他慢慢地重复他的地址，以便售货员小姐能把它记下来。

translation: n. 盐；风趣，刺激性adj. 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的vt. 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化n. (Salt)人名；(西)萨尔特；(英)索尔特
examples: Salt water is more buoyant than fresh water.He had spoiled the soup by putting in too much salt.Adventure is the salt of life to some people.An acid can react with a base to form a salt.They salted down most of the meat for their later use.Rub salt into the meat before cooking it.The stew tastes flat; you'd better salt it with a little salt.
盐水比淡水浮力大。他往汤里放盐太多，把汤给糟蹋了。冒险对某些人来说是生活中的刺激。酸可以和碱起反应而生成盐。他们将大部分肉用盐腌起来，以备日后用。烹调前先把盐擦在肉上。炖肉有些淡，最好再加点盐。

translation: adj. 相同的；同一的；上述的（通常与the连用）；无变化的pron. 同样的事物或人（通常与the连用）adv. 同样地（通常与the连用）n. (Same)人名；(意)萨梅
examples: He praised my work and in the same breath told me I would have to leave.I resigned on Friday and left that same day.Father sits in the same chair every evening.I think the same of him as you do.Their ages are the same.All the same, there's some truth in what she says.He's not very reliable, but I like him just the same.
他称赞我工作好，刚说完这话就让我离职。我星期五辞职後当天就离开了。父亲每晚都坐在同一张椅子上，我对他的看法和你一样。他们的年龄相同。即便这样，她的话也还是有些道理。他是不太可靠，但我仍很喜欢他。

translation: n. 沙；沙地；沙洲；沙滩；沙子vt. 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子vi. 被沙堵塞n. (Sand)人名；(英、德、意、芬、罗、捷、挪)桑德；(瑞典)桑德；(法)桑
examples: Dry sand absorbs water.Ouch! The sand is so hot! I can burn my feet.A grain of sand made my right eye tear.The children on the sand were shouting with excitement.The roads were sanded after the snowstorm.Sand the wood until it has a nice bevel.Sand the walls down before you paint them.Sand has disguisedall entrances to the mine.
干沙吸收水份。哎哟！沙子这么烫！会烫伤脚的。一粒沙子弄得我右眼淌泪。沙滩上的孩子们兴奋得大喊大叫。道路在暴风雪之后铺上了沙子。用砂纸打磨这块木头，磨出一个光滑的斜面。在油漆前要先把墙壁打磨光滑.沙掩盖住了那个矿的所有入口。

translation: vt. 夹入；挤进；把...做成三明治n. 三明治；夹心面包
examples: I had a ham sandwich as lunch.I'll try a chicken salad sandwich.I'm busy today but I will sandwich that job after supper.He was sandwiched between two fat women on the bus.I sandwich a bookmark in my book.
我吃了一个火腿三明治作午餐。我想尝尝鸡肉色拉三明治。今天我很忙，但我会在晚饭后挤出时间干那件事。他在公共汽车上被夹在两个胖女人中间。我把书签夹在书中。

translation: n. 卫星；人造卫星；随从；卫星国家
examples: Troop movements can be observed from space by a satellite.The equipment picked up the signal from the satellite.The bbc is hooked up with Australian television by satellite.
藉助卫星可观察到部队的调动。这设备收到了卫星发出的信号。英国广播公司通过卫星与澳大利亚电视实行联播。

translation: n. 星期六
examples: I wish tomorrow was Saturday.The concert will be given on Saturday.She goes swimming on Saturdays.We will go to the cinema on Saturday morning.My wallet was stolen last Saturday.Saturday afternoons go by like lightning!
我希望明天就是星期六。音乐会将于星期六举行。她每个星期六都游泳。我们将于星期六早晨去看电影。上周六我的钱包被偷了。星期六的下午象闪电一样转瞬即逝！

translation: vt. 节省；保存；储蓄；解救vi. 节省；挽救prep. 除...之外n. 救援n. (Save)人名；(法)萨夫；(意、保、西、罗、塞、瑞典)萨薇 (女名)，萨韦
examples: The doctor managed to save his life.Children should learn to save.I lent him my bike in order that he could save time.Save your strength for the hard work you'll have to do later.
医生救了他的命。孩子们应学会储蓄。我把自行车借给他,以便他能节省一些时间。留着点儿劲儿,你一会儿还得干重活儿呢。

translation: vt. 讲；说明；例如；声称；假设；指明vi. 讲；表示；念；假定；背诵n. (Say)人名；(土)萨伊；(法、老、柬)赛；(英)塞伊；(匈、罗)绍伊
examples: He said hello to me with a smile.She said that she liked singing.He will of course say yes to my proposal.Be quiet, I've something to say to you.Why don't you make it another time, say Friday?You may learn to play the violin in, say, three year.The clock says three o'clock.We are considering giving them greater say in such matters.We had no say in the decision to sell the companyDon't interrupt her, let her have her say.I shall have my own say in the matter.
他面带微笑地和我打了个招呼。她说她喜欢唱歌。他一定会同意我的建议的。安静, 我有话要对你们讲。为什么不改个时间,比如说星期五?你可以,比如说,在三年内学会拉小提琴。这表三点钟了。我们正考虑在这样的事情上给他们更多的发言权。在决定出售公司的问题上,我们没有发言权。别打断她,让她把意见说出来。我会把自己对这个问题的想法说出来。

translation: n. 风景；景色；舞台布景
examples: The scenery is beautiful beyond description.We admired the splendor of the mountain scenery.He asked us to lash the scenery up with rope.The scenery in the play is beautiful, but the actors get in front of it.The scenery for the play is rather beautiful.
那里的风光美得难以描述。我们赞赏着壮丽的山景。他要我们用绳子把舞台背景绑起来。那出戏的背景很美，可惜演员们站在前面给挡住了。那出戏的舞台布景很漂亮。

translation: n. 学校；学院；学派；鱼群vt. 教育
examples: She studies in a high school.Soon, the whole school knew about her win.This is the argument of the school.The Prague School has three important points.What was your experience in film school like?The graduate school is recruiting students, you can try.She should be schooled with her peers.I have schooled myself to remain calm under pressure.
她在一所中学学习。不久，全校师生都知道她获胜了。这就是流行学派的论据。布拉格学派有三个至为重要的观点。可否谈谈你在大学电影系的经历?研究生院在招生，你可以试试啊！她应当与她的同龄人一起接受教育。我练就一副在压力之下保持镇静的本领。

translation: n. 书包
examples: The schoolbag is for Mary for her new school year.My brother always misplaces his schoolbag.
书包是给玛丽的新学年礼物。我弟弟常常乱放他的书包。

translation: 中学毕业生
examples: Now more middle school graduates will be admitted into universities.A gap year offers high school graduates a valuable opportunity to __recognize their own occupational interests and goals.___.
现在更多的中学毕业生将被大学录取。间隔年为中学毕业生提供了一个宝贵的机会去认清自己的职业兴趣和目标。

translation: n. 男学生；学童
examples: He is a nine-year-old schoolboy.The ratio of schoolboys to schoolgirls is 2 to 1.The schoolboy made a face at his teacher's back.
他是一个九岁的男学生。男学生和女学生的比例是2比1。那个男生对着教师的背后做个鬼脸。

translation: n. 科学；技术；学科；理科n. (Science)人名；(英)赛恩斯
examples: She dedicated her life to science.Apparently impossible feats are now accomplished by science.He started to study ecology and decided to devote his whole life to the science.The college graduated 50 students from the science department last year.I also shifted from science to economics.In this game, you need more science than strength.
她毕生致力于科学。许多看起来不可能的伟大业绩现在已经由科学实现了。他开始研究生态学,并决心将他的一生献身于这门学科。这所学院去年有50名理科毕业生。我从自然科学转入经济学。在这项比赛中，技巧比力气更重要。

translation: n. 科学家
examples: The young girl aspired to be a scientist.When will scientist conquer cancer?The scientist needs some delicate instruments.The scientist is distinguished in many spheres of knowledge.The scientist discovered the plant in the most inaccessible reaches of the jungle.The humanitarian scientist called on the improvement of the poor's living condition.A German scientist interrupted me and asked if I came from China.Scientists haven't found the pathogeny of the disease.
小女孩立志要做一名科学家。科学家什么时候才能征服癌症呢？这位科学家需要一些精密的仪器。这位科学家在许多知识领域中都是杰出的。这位科学家在丛林深处最难进入的区域发现了这种植物。这位人道主义科学家呼吁改善穷人的生活条件。一位德国科学家打断了我，并问我是否来自中国。科学家们尚未发现这种病的病因。

translation: n. 剪刀；剪式跳法v. 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）
examples: Leonardo Da Vinci invented the scissors.We bought some new scissors yesterday.Blunt scissors don't cut cleanly.
达芬奇发明了剪刀。我们昨天买了一些新剪刀。钝剪刀剪不齐。

translation: n. 分数；二十；配乐；刻痕vt. 获得；评价；划线，刻划；把…记下vi. 得分；记分；刻痕n. (Score)人名；(英)斯科尔
examples: Hughes scored two goals before half-time.The army continued to score successes in the south.They scored the floor-boards by pushing furniture about.could you please score my name off?Critics scored him for his foolishness.He learned how to score a musical composition.I recorded the score in a notebook.There are deep scores on the rock.He bought two score of apples yesterday.Look at the score and try to play that song.This is continued until a complete score is written.The home team has yet to score.Who is going to score for both sides?That is where you score over others.
休斯在上半场进了两个球.军队在南方不断取得胜利。他们推动家具请把我的名字从名单中划掉好吗?评论家批评他愚蠢。他学会了怎样谱曲。我在笔记本上记下了分数。岩石上有深深的刻痕。他昨天买了四十个苹果。看乐谱演奏一下那首曲子。这样一直继续到整个乐谱写完。主队还没有得分.谁来为双方记分?那是你优于别人的地方。

translation: n. 苏格兰
examples: Scotland has its own criminal law.A great deal of whiskey is made in Scotland.
苏格兰有它自己的刑法。很多威士忌酒在苏格兰酿造。

translation: n. 擦伤；抓痕；刮擦声；乱写adj. 打草稿用的；凑合的；碰巧的vt. 抓；刮；挖出；乱涂vi. 抓；搔；发刮擦声；勉强糊口；退出比赛
examples: The dog is scratching at the door.He pretended to scratch his ear.I had to scratch my head to remember his name.Be careful not to scratch the furniture.He scratched out my name on that list.Will you scratch that sticker off the car window?There's a scratch on the side of my car.You can clean the scratch with alcohol.He heard the scratch of a match.His career started from scratch.I decide to learn English from scratch.
狗正在抓门。他假装搔耳朵。我只想苦苦地回忆他的名字。小心别刮坏家具。他把我的名字从那个名单上删除。请你把车窗上的那张贴纸撕下好吗?我的汽车侧面有一道划痕。你可以用酒精把擦痕去掉。他听到划火柴的声音。他的事业从头开始。我决定从头学习英语。

translation: n. 屏，幕；屏风vt. 筛；拍摄；放映；掩蔽vi. 拍电影n. (Screen)人名；(英)斯克林
examples: The advertisement is full of the TV screen today.Buzz suddenly appeared on my computer screen.Familiar scenes were imaged on the screen.Someday I will be a star on the big screen.His first play has been translated to the screen.They put a screen around his bed so that the doctor could examine him.There is a beautiful antique screen in their living room.The mound can be used as our screen.He looked through the screen and saw that Bill and Ted were in the back seat.The purpose of a screen door is to keep flies out.The screen cannot shut out the sunshine.The curtains screen out the sunlight.The camera lens must be screened from direct sunlight.I am not willing to screen you from blame .You can't screen your children from the real life forever.This novel does not screen well.They will screen a new movie at 9 a.m.The series is currently being screened on BBC2 on Fridays.We must screen the sand grains out of the silver sand.It is now possible to screen babies for diabetes.You can use an answerphone to screen your phone calls before you answer them.

今天，电视屏幕被广告占据。巴兹突然出现在我的电脑屏幕上。银幕上映出了熟悉的景象。有一天我将成为大银幕上的明星。他写的第一个剧本已被搬上银幕。他们在他床的四周放上屏风，以便医生给他检查。在他们的客厅里有一个漂亮的古董屏风。这个土丘可做我们的掩蔽物。透过纱窗，他看到比尔和特德坐在后排。纱门的作用是不让苍蝇飞进。筛子遮不住太阳。窗帘遮住了阳光。照相机的镜头不可受到阳光的直射。我不愿包庇你。你不能永远护住自己的子女，不让他们接触现实生活。这部小说不适于拍成电影。上午9点,影院将上映一部新片。这部剧现在每周五在BBC二台播出。我们要把细沙中的沙粒筛出去。目前可以为婴儿做糖尿病的检查。你可以用电话答录机在接听电话之前来检查这些来电。

translation: n. 海；海洋；许多；大量
examples: The moonlight shone on the calm sea.The sea covers nearly three-fourths of the world's surface.The sea seemed to melt into the sky at the horizon.
月光映在平静的海面上。海洋几乎占地球表面的四分之三。在水平线处，海洋似渐渐没入天际。

translation: vi. 搜寻；调查；探求vt. 搜索；搜寻；调查；搜查；探求n. 搜寻；探究，查究n. (Search)人名；(英)瑟奇
examples: They searched the woods for the little boy.She searched through the pile of papers and found his letter underneath.He spent his life searching after truth.Let me search into this matter for you.Investigators continue to search for the cause of the outbreak.The search proved fruitless.The search party spread out over the moor.The insurance company went to the hospital in search of the reason for his death.
他们在森林中搜寻到了那个小男孩。她在一堆文件里搜寻，终于在底下找到了他的信。他一生探求真理。让我为你调查这件事。调查人员继续对暴发根源进行了调查。搜寻没有结果。搜索队在荒草地分散行动。保险公司到医院调查他的死因。

translation: n. 时期；季节；赛季vt. 给…调味；使适应vi. 变得成熟；变干燥
examples: Winter is the coldest season in a year.He will captain the basketball team next season.Holiday prices are lower out of season.The last three years have been a good season for the company.You can season the soup with salt and pepper.He seasoned his conversation with jokes and anecdotes.He began to season the arid climate in the Middle East.
冬季是一年中最冷的季节。他将在下个赛季担任该篮球队的队长。在度假淡季，度假费用较低。过去三年一直是公司的兴旺时期。你可以用盐和胡椒来调汤的味道。他偶开玩笑,且运用典故,这使交谈妙趣横生。他开始适应了中东的干热气候。

translation: n. 座位；所在地；职位vt. 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
examples: He sat down on the nearest available seat.She got on the bus and picked a seat up front.His body was flung across the cell and fetched up against the base of the lavatory seat.He lost his seat in the Parliament at the election.I have worn the seat of this skirt thin .Washington is the seat of government of the US.We want to buy a car that can seat five persons.We can only seat you in twenty minutes.We can seat 300 in the auditorium.She purposely sat in the outside seat.He buckled himself into his seat.
他在最近的空座位上坐下来。她上了公车,找了个最前面的座位。他的身体倒到牢房另一头去，掉在便盆的底座前。他在选举中失去了议会中的席位。我已经把这条裙子的臀部磨薄了。华盛顿是美国政府所在地。我们想要买一辆能坐五个人的汽车。20分钟以后能安排您入座。我们这个礼堂可容纳三百人她故意坐在外面座位上。他坐在椅子上扣上了安全带。

translation: n. 秒；第二名；瞬间；二等品vt. 支持adj. 第二的；次要的；附加的num. 第二adv. 第二；其次；居第二位n. (Second)人名；(法)塞孔
examples: Her beautiful roses won the second prize at the flower show.Our goods are second to none in the world market.The bookcase needs a second coat of paint.The train will leave in a second.It travels thousands of miles per second.Second, smoking is harmful also to your family members.Second, he failed to make clear his true purpose.The motion has been seconded.I second his motion that we should set up a special board to examine the problem.Mrs Smith proposed the vote of thanks, and Mr Jones seconded.
她那些美丽的玫瑰在花展上得了二等奖。在国际市场上,我们的商品不亚于任何人。这个书柜需要再刷一层漆。列车马上要开了。它一秒钟能走几千英里。第二,吸烟也会给你的家人带来危害。其次,他没有把他的真实目的表达清楚。这一提议得到了支持。他提议成立一个特别委员会来研究这个问题,我赞成。史密斯夫人提议大家鼓掌表示感谢，琼斯先生附议。

translation: n. 秘密；秘诀；机密adj. 秘密的；机密的n. (Secret)人名；(法)塞克雷
examples: Our plan must remain a secret.His secret died with him, for he never told anyone.What new secrets of the universe will the new telescope reveal?What's the secret of baking perfect bread?We discovered a secret passage behind the wall.The congressman denied that the report was being kept secret.
我们的计划必须保密。他的秘密至死也不为人知，因为他从未告诉过别人。新的望远镜将会给我们展示宇宙的哪些新奥秘呢？烤出好面包的秘诀是什么？我们在墙后发现了一个秘密通道。该国会议员否认这是一份机密报告。

translation: vt. 看见；理解；领会；觉察；拜访vi. 看；看见；领会n. (See)人名；(英)西伊；(柬)塞；(德)泽
examples: If you shut your eyes you can't see.When the sun goes down, we can see the stars.It is getting dark and I cannot see to read."The door opens like this.""Oh, I see."I'm mystified; I just can't see how he did it.The teacher checked the roster to see whom he would teach this year.In so far as I can see, the representatives are all satisfied with the arrangement.This little girl has seen so much misery in her time.I can't see myself allowing people to cheat me.The see of the pope is namely the bishop of Rome.
要是把眼睛闭上就什么也看不见了。当太阳落下,我们能看见星星。天渐渐黑了,我看不见字,无法再阅读了。“这门是这样开的。”,“噢,我明白了。”我大惑不解，就是不明白他是怎么做到的。老师查看花名册, 想了解今年要教的学生。据我了解,代表们对这一安排都感到满意。这个小女孩经历了很多的苦难。我无法想象会让人骗了。罗马教皇,即罗马的主教的教座。

translation: vi. 似乎；像是；装作n. (Seem)人名；(英)西姆
examples: He seems to know everything.The children seem unaffected emotionally by their parent's divorce.Well, funny things seem to be happening.I'm sorry, I seem to have mislaid my ticket.
他似乎什么都懂。孩子在情绪上似乎未受到父母离婚的影响。哦,似乎有些怪事正在不断发生。对不起,我的车票好像弄丢了。

translation: vt. 销售；推销；出卖；欺骗vi. 卖；出售；受欢迎；有销路n. 销售；失望；推销术n. (Sell)人名；(德)泽尔；(英、芬、瑞典)塞尔
examples: Her name will help to sell the film.The group's record has sold millions.I'd like to buy your house if you are willing to sell it.Are artists who work in advertising selling themselves?It is not price but quality that sells our shoes.
有她的名字，这部影片就卖座。他们的唱片已经售出了千千万万张了。如果你愿意卖的话，我想买你的房子。艺术家做广告是不是作践自己？我们的鞋好卖不是因为价钱低而是因为质量好。

translation: n. 讨论会，研讨班
examples: The old professor had presided over a seminar for theoretical physicists.I attended almost every lecture and seminar when I was at college.He also told me that your attendance at his tutorial and seminar had was poor.He conducted a seminar on learning strategies at our campus last weekend.
老教授主持了一次理论物理学家的研讨会。我上大学时,几乎每一个讲座和研讨会都去参加。他还告诉我说你的辅导课和讨论课出勤率不高。上周他在我们学校办了一个有关学习策略的学习班。

translation: vt. 发送，寄；派遣；使进入；发射vi. 派人；寄信n. 上升运动n. (Send)人名；(德)森德
examples: You are now ready to send messages.Radio Beijing sends the news all over the world.I'll send someone to show you around.The music of this song sent her carefree and joyous.The flowers send forth special fragrance.We will send the goods by railroad.I think we need to send out for the missing lamb.I want to send away for some books I need.The radio operator was still sending when the ship went down.
现在你可以可以发送消息了。北京广播电台向全世界播送新闻。我派人带你到周围转转。这支歌的乐曲使她心旷神怡。这些花散发出特别的香味。我们将用铁路运输货物。我想我们得派个人去找那头迷路的小羊羔。我想发函购买我需要的一些书籍。当船沉没时无线电操作人员仍在发送消息

translation: n. 九月
examples: The temperature drops in September.We've had to put our wedding off until September.The industrial exposition will be held on September.
气温在九月间下降。我们得把婚礼延期到九月举行。工业博览会将于九月召开。

translation: adj. 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的
examples: Do not treat this serious matter as a joke.A serious look passed over his face.There was a serious motor smash on the bridge.We are today facing a serious credit crunch.The hardest task of a girl's life is to prove to a man that his intention is serious.I was pretty serious in what I said at dinner.It was felt inappropriate by some that such a serious occasion should include dancing.
不要把这件严肃的事情当作笑料。他脸上显出一副严肃的神色。桥上发生了严重的汽车相撞事故。我们今日正面对严重的信贷困难。女孩子生命中最困难的任务是去证实一位男士(对她)的意思是认真的。我晚餐时说的话是当真的。有些人认为在如此庄重的场合跳舞实在是不妥。

translation: vt. 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用vi. 服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候n. 发球，轮到发球n. (Serve)人名；(法)塞尔夫
examples: We must serve the people heart and soul.The waiter is serving another customer.He served as a naval officer during the war.The large box in his room can serve as a desk too.He served four terms in Congress.They have served me shamefully.Whose serve is it now?
我们必须全心全意地为人民服务。侍应正侍候另一位客人。战时他在海军当军官。他房间里的那只大箱子也可以当桌子用。他在国会任职四届。他们一直待我很坏。该谁发球了？

translation: 服务费
examples: A 10% service charge is added on to the bill.There is no service charge at the mechanic shop.
帐单上包括了百分之十的服务费。这家技工店是不收服务费的。

translation: n. [数] 集合；一套；布景；[机] 装置vt. 树立；点燃；点缀；vi. (日,月)落沉；凝固；结果adj. 固定的；规定的；固执的n. (Set)人名；(瑞典)塞特；(俄)谢特
examples: He set aside the book and lit a cigarette.How do we set the enrollment criteria?We have set the date for the wedding.We set a limit on the expenses of the trip.These instruments have been finely set.The manager set various tasks to the clerks.I saw the sun set down inch by inch in the courtyard.She had the sapphire set in a gold ring.pig styIt may be a very simple or complicated set of instructions.The set of types is the combined set from the two properties.The sun has rise and set.I received a set of gardening tools on my birthday.She has a set of false teeth.How many points is the winner to get before one set ends?The cast must all be on the set by 7 in the moring.She admired the firm set of his jaw.Please follow the set procedures when you use this product.There is no set time limit on this.He is old and stubborn and set in his ways.Are you set for the party tonight?As people get older, they get set in their ways.His face took on a set expression.

他把书放置在一边,点燃了香烟。我们如何设定录取标准?我们已经确定了婚期。我们规定了这次旅游的费用。这些仪器是经过精密调整的。经理向职员们分配各项任务。我在院子里看到太阳慢慢地落下去。她把那枚蓝宝石镶在金戒指上了。猪圈这个指令的集合可能非常简单，也可能十分复杂。该类型集是两个属性的组合集。太阳总要有日出日落的。生日那天，我收到一套园艺工具。她有一副假牙。要取得多少分才能算赢一局?全体演员必须在早上7点钟到场。她喜欢他那副紧绷着下巴的刚毅神态。使用该产品时请遵循规定的步骤。这个没有固定的时间限制。他年老气衰,固执己见,做事方式一成不变。你准备好了参加今天晚上的宴会吗？随着年龄的增长，人就积习成性。他脸上现出凝滞的神态。

translation: num. 七个，七n. 七个，七adj. 七的；七个的n. (Seven)人名；(土库、阿塞)谢文；(土)塞文
examples: There are seven continents in the world.Four multiplied by seven is twenty-eight.I have seven roommates in my university.
世界上有七大洲。7乘4等于28。上大学时，我有七个室友。

translation: adj. 几个的；各自的pron. 几个；数个
examples: I bought several books yesterday.My husband has several shirts of different colors.The regime has been propped up by several monopoly capitalists.They shook hands and went their several ways.
我昨天买了好几本书。我丈夫有好几件颜色不同的衬衫。那个政权一直是受到若干垄断资本家的支持而维持着的。他们握了手,然后各自走各的路。

translation: aux. 应；会；将；必须
examples: Shall we all go to the film tonight?Everything shall be in good order.World peace is a cause we shall all work for.I shall follow all your instructions.It is certain that we shall succeed.Shall we take our swim-suits?
我们今晚都去看电影吗?一切都应该井然有序。争取世界和平是一项我们都应该为之而努力的事业。我一定照您的指示去做。我们一定会成功的。我们带着游泳衣好不好？

translation: n. 形状；模型；身材；具体化vt. 形成；塑造，使成形；使符合vi. 形成；成形；成长n. (Shape)人名；(瑞典)沙佩
examples: This island is triangular in shape.I'm having trouble giving shape to my ideas in this essay.John: Well, I'm a bit out of shape and I was thinking of joining your gym.In the process it became less amorphous in shape.It was the Greeks who shaped the thinking of Western man.Mark didn't shape up until he was thirty years old.The metal in the mould hardened into shape.Our plan is beginning to take shape.
这个岛的外形呈三角形。我在这篇文章中表达不清自己的想法。嗯,我身材有点走样,正考虑加入你们的健身俱乐部。在过程中它变得较不无定形在形状。正是希腊人影响了西方人的思维。马克到三十岁时才振奋起来。模子里的金属硬化成形。我们的计划开始成形了。

translation: n. 鲨鱼；骗子vi. 诈骗vt. 敲诈
examples: The shark snapped its jaws shut.The shark is dangerous to swimmers.He told me he once caught a shark, but I know he was swinging the lead.That shark lent me money at very high interest rate.The loan shark sliced off my fingers with a saw.
鲨鱼啪嗒一声把嘴合上了。鲨鱼对游泳的人来说很危险。他告诉我有一回他捕到了一条鲨鱼，我知道他是在胡诌。那个贪婪狡猾的人以很高的利率借给我钱。放高利贷的人用一把锯子切掉了我的手指。

translation: n. 卷笔刀；[机] 磨具；研磨者
examples: Nobody else has a pencil sharpener.The boy is sharpening his pencils with a sharpener.
再没有谁有卷笔刀了。那男孩正在用卷笔刀削铅笔。

translation: pron. 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）n. 女人；雌性动物n. (She)人名；(中)佘(普通话·威妥玛)
examples: She weighs 50 kilograms.She can speak Japanese as well as English.She has served the family faithfully for thirty years.
她的体重有50公斤。她会说日语和英语。她为这个家忠心耿耿地操劳了30年。

translation: n. 羊，绵羊；胆小鬼
examples: Can you distinguish goat from sheep?The dog that molested the sheep was killed.The sheep are lambing this week.Will the hedge keep the sheep out of the field?We're dealing with a wolf in sheep's clothing.Black And Brown Finished Sheep Leather.
你能把山羊和绵羊区分开吗？那只骚扰绵羊的狗被杀死了。这个星期绵羊要产羔。这篱笆能将羊群挡在田地外面吗？我们是在跟一只披著羊皮的狼打交道。印度求购羊皮。

translation: n. 架子；搁板；搁板状物；暗礁
examples: He poised the glass on the shelf.There were a lot of books on the shelves along the walls.Please lift the box down from the shelf for me.I screwed up the jar and put it back on the shelf.The plan has been put on a shelf since it's unrealistic.A retired person should not be made to feel he's on the shelf.
他把玻璃杯稳稳地放在架子上。靠墙的书架上有许多书。请帮我把这只箱子从搁板上抬下来。我把罐子拧上盖儿,放回搁架。鉴于其非现实性,该计划已被搁置。不应该让退休的人感到自己是个闲人

translation: vi. 发出光；反射光，闪耀；出类拔萃，表现突出；露出；照耀；显露；出众vt. 照射，擦亮；把…的光投向；（口）通过擦拭使…变得有光泽或光n. 光亮，光泽；好天气；擦亮；晴天；擦皮鞋；鬼把戏或诡计n. （英）夏因（人名）；（日）新荣（人名）
examples: The curtain was suddenly drawn and a bright light shone in.He shines at golf.The sun is shinning brightly.Shine your torch into the drawer.I hate lights being shone in my face.The waxed floor had a good shine.Now her hair has taken on a healthy shine.The fete will take place on Sunday, rain or shine.Would you put a good shine on these boots?I think that dog has taken a shine to me: it follows me everywhere.
突然窗帘拉了开来，一道强光照了进来。他高尔夫球打得很出色。今天阳光格外明媚。你用手电筒照一下这抽屉里面。我不喜欢灯光正对著我的脸。打蜡地板闪闪发光。现在她的头发呈现健康的色泽。游园义卖会定于星期日举行,风雨无阻。你把这些靴子好好擦一下好吗？我想这狗已经喜欢上我了，我走到哪儿它跟到哪儿。

translation: vt. 运送，乘船；以船运送vi. 上船；乘船旅行；当船员n. 船；舰；太空船n. (Ship)人名；(中)摄(广东话·威妥玛)
examples: The ship was due to sail the following morning.A terrible storm forced the ship to put back.The paint on the ship's sides was coming off.Please inform us when we should ship the goods.We ship our products anywhere within Great Britain.The oil company will ship out the heavy equipment.The ship forged ahead through the stormy sea.We must transfer to ship after arriving in Shanghai.
这艘船定于第二天启航。可怕的风暴迫使这条船返航了。舰壳两边的漆开始脱落。请通知我们什么时候装运货物。我们运送我们的产品到大不列颠的任何地方。石油公司将用船运送重型设备。船在风急浪高的海面上稳稳行进。我们到上海后得转乘轮船。

translation: n. 衬衫；汗衫，内衣
examples: She shortened the shirt by an inch.What size of collar is this shirt?Will you stitch a button on this shirt?Would you sew this button onto my shirt?My husband has several shirts of different colors.
她把衬衫截短了一英寸。这衬衣领子的尺寸是多少？请你在这件衬衫上钉一颗钮扣好吗？请你把这颗纽扣缝到我的衬衫上好吗？我丈夫有好几件颜色不同的衬衫。

translation: n. 鞋；蹄铁；外胎vt. 给……穿上鞋；穿……鞋n. (Shoe)人名；(英)休
examples: The shoes are a perfect fit.My shoe laces have come undone.I can feel a nail sticking into my shoe.She eased her injured foot into her shoe.His horse cast a shoe.Your car has worn brake shoes.I bent over to put my shoe on the other day and fell off the bench.
这双鞋子穿着非常合脚。我的鞋带松开了。我觉得有钉子扎进鞋里。她小心翼翼地把受伤的脚伸进鞋里。他的马脱落了一只蹄铁。你的车装上了制动蹄片。有一天我弯腰穿鞋时从凳子上摔了下来。

translation: vt. 射击，射中；拍摄；发芽；使爆炸；给…注射vi. 射击；发芽；拍电影n. 射击；摄影；狩猎；急流
examples: This is just a toy gun; it doesn't shoot.He shot the bird with his gun.The sports car shot past us.The scene was shot on location.The enemies made shoots at us.Two weeks after we'd planted the seeds, little green shoots started to appear.Shoot! My coat is caught in the door.
这只是玩具枪, 不能发射子弹。他用枪打鸟。赛车从我们前面飞驰而过。这个景是实地拍摄的。敌人向我们发起射击。我们播种后两周,绿色的小嫩芽就开始长出了。哇，上衣被车门夹住了。

translation: n. 商店；店铺vt. 购物vi. 购物；买东西
examples: The local dress shop is having a sale.The dresses in the shop are priced high.That shop has a large connection.I saw both of them at work in the shop.The foreman oversaw the workers in the shop.Women in general like to shop for new clothes.I usually go shopping on Sundays.I have 3 days free. I'm going to HK to shop.I believe that it will be easier to shop online in the future.My mother was out shopping.
附近的时装店正在大拍卖。这家商店的衣服定价很高。那商店有一大批顾客。我看见他们两人都在车间干活。这个工头在车间里监视工人。大多数妇女喜欢逛街买新衣服。我通常星期天购物。我有3天假,我想去香港购物。我相信将来在网上购物将会更容易。我母亲出去买东西了。

translation: n. 购物，买东西v. 购物（shop的ing形式）
examples: I am opposed to going shopping with others.That new shopping centre is a real eyesore.Let's make a date to go shopping next Friday.I would have gone shopping if it hadn't rained.
我反对与他人一起外出购物。那个新的购物中心真是难看极了。我们就定在下星期五去买东西吧。如果不下雨，我本来要去买东西的。

translation: adj. 短的；不足的；矮的，低的n. 短；缺乏；短路；短裤adv. 不足；突然；唐突地n. (Short)人名；(英)肖特
examples: You've cut my hair very short.In contrast with his brothers, Tom is rather short.Let's take a short break for lunch.These goods are in short supply; the price will be high.The usual word "pub" is short for "public house".He was short with me this morning.Compare the short vowel in 'full' and the long vowel in 'fool'.The children mustn't go short of food.We often run short of staff in the summer.All too often you pitch the ball short.His achievements had fallen short of his hopes.Excuse me, but I'll have to cut you short.Her singing career was cut short by a car accident.

你把我头发剪得太短了。与几位兄弟相比,汤姆的个子相当矮。让我们休息一会儿，去吃午饭。这些商品现正供应不足，价格会上涨。常用的“pub”一词是“public house”的简略形式。他今天早上对我无礼。比较 full 中的短元音和 fool 中的长元音。孩子们不可以缺少食物。夏天我们的人手经常不够用。你投球老是距离不够。他的成就没有达到他期望的那么大。对不起,打断你一下。她的歌唱事业被一场车祸所终结。

translation: n. 发射；炮弹；射手；镜头adj. 用尽的；破旧的；杂色的，闪光的v. 射击（shoot的过去式和过去分词）
examples: He gave me a second shot of penicillin.Eight-year-old Griffin Stevens made the shot of a lifetime this past weekend.In this case, the ever-changing waves are part of our shot.I heard a shot in his room.The deer was peppered with shot all down one side.I'm shot. I'm too old for this job.
他又给我打了一针青霉素。8岁的格里芬史蒂文斯在本周末创造了一次一生难忘的投篮。在本例中,不断变化的波浪也是我们拍摄的一部分内容。我听到他的房间内一声枪响。那只死鹿的半边身子都被子弹击中。我一点力气都没有了，我这岁数干不动这活儿了。

translation: aux. 应该；就；可能；将要
examples: You should take advantage of it.It should cost roughly 10.You should give it a try.That he should speak to you like that is quite astonishing.I knew if I kept at it I should succeed.
你应该好好利用这个机会。这大约10英镑。你应该试一试。他竟然这样对你说话我知道如果我坚持下去就会成功。

translation: vi. 呼喊；喊叫；大声说vt. 呼喊；大声说n. 呼喊；呼叫
examples: He opened his mouth to shout, but no sound came out.He didn't shout, he just glared at me silently.The children on the sand were shouting with excitement.The crowd shouted the speaker down.Her warning shout came too late.His news was greeted with shouts of joy.They heard him give a loud shout of astonishment.
他张开嘴呼喊,但是没有发出声音。他没有喊叫，只是默默地怒视着我。沙滩上的孩子们兴奋得大喊大叫。群众高声喊叫把演讲人的声音压了下去。她发出的警告呼喊声来得太晚了。大家都对他的消息报以欢呼。他们听见他惊奇地大叫一声。

translation: vt. 显示；说明；演出；展出vi. 显示；说明；指示n. 显示；表演；炫耀n. (Show)人名；(中)邵(普通话·威妥玛)；(英)肖
examples: The study shows an increase in the disease among the elderly.Her laziness showed in her exam results.Let's show a picture to our audience.She showed the technique to her students.Can you show me the right way to do this?His nod showed his approval of this plan.She show a high degree of skill in her work.The chairman showed displeasure at his remark.I'll send someone to show you around.The clock showed midnight.The new unearthed cultural relics were shown in the museum.The study shows an increase in the disease among the elderly.The movie is being shown now.I waited an hour but he didn't show.Diana is modeling for a fashion show.All the new products were on show at the exhibition.He clenched his fist to make a show of strength.His smile was just for show;he has a plot in his mind.She runs the whole show.He put up a good show in the final examination.

这项研究证明这种疾病在老年人群中的发病率呈上升趋势。她平时懒惰从她的考试成绩可以看得出来。要给大家展示一幅画卷啊。她向学生演示了那个技巧。你能告诉我做这件事的正确方法吗？他点点头,表示对该计划的赞成。她在工作中表现出高度的技巧。主持人对他的话露出不悦之色。我派人带你到周围转转。时钟显示已是午夜。新出土的文物陈列在博物馆里。这项研究证明这种疾病在老年人群中的发病率呈上升趋势。这部影片目前正在上映。我等了一个小时，可他一直没露面。戴安娜正在时装表演会上当模特。展览会上陈列著所有的新产品。他握紧拳头来显示自己的力量。他的笑容只是装装样子；内心却另有计谋。她负责全部业务。他在期末考试中表现得不错。

translation: n. 淋浴；（倾泻般出现的）一阵，一大批；阵雨vt. 大量地给予；把……弄湿vi. 淋浴；下阵雨
examples: She is taking a shower.Scattered showers are expected this afternoon.The weatherman predict shower this afternoon.The neighbors held a bridal shower for the girl.The policemen were assailed by a shower of stones.I have received a shower of letters recently.The firework exploded in a shower of sparks.I always shower after getting up.It suddenly started to shower.The dancer was showered with praise.People shower the newly-weds with confetti .The best way to help a troubled child is to shower him with love.Good wishes showered (down) on the bride and bridegroom.Honours were showered upon the hero.
她正在洗淋浴。预料今天下午有零星阵雨。气象预告员说,今天下午有阵雨。邻居为姑娘举行了一个准新娘送礼会。警察遭到一阵石块的袭击。最近我收到了一大批信件。烟火炸开放出一阵火花。起床后我总是洗个淋浴。突然下起阵雨。那个跳舞的人备受称赞。人们向新婚夫妇撒彩色纸屑。帮助失足少年的最好方法是施之以爱。大家纷纷向新娘新郎祝福。人们纷纷向那位英雄致敬。

translation: vt. 关闭；停业；幽禁vi. 关上；停止营业n. 关闭adj. 关闭的；围绕的n. (Shut)人名；(俄)舒特；(中)室(广东话·威妥玛)
examples: Please shut the door behind you.The office will shut down for christmas.He decided to shut down the shop.He shut himself away for a month to catch up on his academic work.Her mouth opened and shut, but no sound came out.He shut his eyes to her faults.Some coal-mines had to shut down.Business is not good. He'll have to shut the shop.She heard the bedroom window blow shut.With the door shut, rhe room was hot and humid.Keep your mouth shut.Are all the bars shut in this town?The jaws snap shut to take a sample.Some coal-mines had to shut down.
请关上你身后的门。圣诞节办公室将关闭。他决定关闭这家商店。他与世隔绝一个月，力图把功课赶上去。她的嘴张开又闭上了，没有发出声音。他对她的缺点视而不见。有些煤矿不得不关闭。生意不好,他只得打算停业。她听见卧室的窗户被风刮关了。门是关闭的,所以房间里又热又潮。闭上你的嘴。这个城镇里所有的酒吧都停止营业了吗？铁爪急速关闭以抓取样品。有些煤矿不得不关闭。

translation: adj. 害羞的；畏缩的，胆怯的vi. 投；畏缩；惊退；厌恶vt. 投；乱掷n. 投掷；惊跳n. (Shy)人名；(英)夏伊
examples: He was too shy to talk to anyone at the party.He only saw her sweet, shy face.We must not fight shy of hard work.The shy girl was afraid to contradict.
在晚会上他很腼腆，没有和任何人讲话。他只注意到她的甜甜的、腼腆的脸。我们不应回避艰苦的工作。这个害羞的女孩不敢提出反驳意见。

translation: adj. 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的 ；生病的n. 病人n. (Sick)人名；(德、西)西克vt. 使狗去咬；呕吐；追击
examples: He fell sick with malaria on a trip to Africa.He put a maid in to look after his sick wife.You'll be sick if you eat any more of that candy.I'm sick of waiting around like this.I was sick in the car yesterday.The sick need special care.The basin was full of sick.Sick'em!He sicked a dog on the thief.If you need something done, I'll sick him on it.
他在去非洲时患了疟疾。他雇了1名女仆来照顾她的病妻。如果你再吃那种糖果,就会感到恶心的。我讨厌透了像这样在一旁等著。昨天我晕车了。病人需要特别护理。盆里全是吐的东西.咬他们!他纵狗去咬小偷。如果你需要办什么事,我叫他去干。

translation: n. 方面；侧面；旁边vi. 支持；赞助；偏袒adj. 旁的，侧的vt. 同意，支持n. (Side)人名；(英)赛德
examples: My house is the ninth on the right side.The park is just on the left side of this street.We planted tulips along the side of the lawn.The town sprawled along the side of the lake.The side of the boat had been staved in.A square has four sides but a circle has no sides.A cube has six sides.I am always the winning side.He took neither side in the dispute.She argued her side of the case well.The grandfather on his mother's side is still living.He came in through a side door to avoid the crowds.The teacher would like to discuss this side issue later.She always sided with my brother.Why do you always side against me ?
我的房子是右边第九幢。公园就在马路的左侧。我们沿草坪的边缘种上了郁金香小镇顺着湖的边缘扩展。那艘船的侧面已过凿穿了。正方形有四条边，而圆形没有边。立方体有六面。我一直是获胜方。在争论中他任何一方都不参加。她有理有据地陈述了自己的意见。他外祖父还健在。为了避开人群他从旁边的门进来。老师想晚点谈论这个并不重要的问题。她总是带在我哥哥那边。你为什么总站在我的对立面?

translation: n. 人行道
examples: An old lady flaked out on the sidewalk.This sidewalk is made of slabs of stone.
一位老太太昏倒在人行道上。这一人行道是用石板铺成的。

translation: n. 迹象；符号；记号；手势；指示牌vi. 签署；签名vt. 签署；示意
examples: I talked with him by signs.The sign was no longer legible because much of the lettering had worn away.Make sure that the sign's the right way up.There are signs of political unrest in the country.Pay special attention to the sign of the answer.He signed his name on the cheque.The postman asked me to sign for the letter.She signed to us to stop talking.
我和他用手势交谈。这块招牌已看不清楚，因为大部分字已磨掉了。一定要把符号的上下弄对。这个国家有政治不安定的迹象。特别注意答案的正负号。他在支票上签了名。邮差叫我签名收信。她做手势示意我们不要讲话。

translation: n. 丝绸；蚕丝；丝织物adj. 丝的；丝绸的；丝制的vi. （玉米）处于长须的阶段中n. (Silk)人名；(英、瑞典)西尔克
examples: A cocoon is a kind of silk covering made by an insect.She has a scarf made of a triangular piece of blue silk.Their main exports are textiles, especially silk and cotton.The silk is nice and soft.The princess is wearing a dress of the finest silk.She wears a translucent silk gown.Her silk dress rustled as she moved.
蚕茧是由昆虫制造的一种由丝组成的外包层。她有一条用三角形蓝绸子做的围巾。他们的主要出口货物是纺织品，特别是丝绸和棉布。这丝织品很柔软。公主身穿最高级的丝绸衣服。她穿着半透明丝质长袍。她走起路来丝绸衣裙沙沙作响。

translation: conj. 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后prep. 自…以来；自…以后adv. 后来
examples: He must have taken the book since it isn't here.Since you can't answer the question, perhaps we'd better ask someone else.He had spoken to her only once since the party.She's so easily fatigued since her illness.She hasn't been out riding since the accident.Bows and arrows have long since been out of use.He left home two weeks ago and we haven't heard from him since.
他一定是把书拿走了,因为书已不在这里了。既然你无法回答这个问题，我们最好再问问别人。自从那次聚会以来,他只跟她说过一次话。自从病后，她很容易疲劳。她自从出了事故以后，一直没有骑马外出过。弓箭很早以前就没人使用了。他两星期以前离开了家，到现在我们一直没有他的消息。

translation: vi. 唱歌；歌颂；鸣叫；呼号vt. 唱；用诗赞颂；唱着使n. 演唱；鸣声；呼啸声n. (Sing)人名；(老、德、泰)辛
examples: She was singing a lullaby to her child.Let's sing a song during the break.She sang the baby to sleep.Birds sing loudest in the early morning.Our films sing the praises of the new society.The critics are singing the praises of her new book.Did you join in the community sing?
她正在给孩子唱摇篮曲。我们趁这空当儿唱支歌。她给孩子唱歌唱到孩子睡着。鸟儿在清晨高声歌唱。我们的电影歌颂新社会。评论家高度赞扬她写的新书。你们有没有参加社区的合唱会?

translation: n. 歌手，歌唱家n. (Singer)人名；(英、德、瑞典、塞、罗、捷、葡、土)辛格；(法)桑热
examples: The pop singer is the idol of young people.Her success as a popular singer was ephemeral.
这位流行歌手成为年轻人崇拜的偶像。作为流行歌曲歌手她取得的成功只是昙花一现。

translation: adj. 单一的；单身的；单程的n. 一个；单打；单程票vt. 选出vi. 击出一垒安打
examples: The letter was written on a single sheet of paper.I'd like to have a single room, preferably, facing south.Every single child will receive a gift.Freshwater is the single most precious element for life on earth.He can't stay single for a long time.A single room with a bath, if possible.I need a single ticket to Paris tonight.There are two second-class singles to Leeds.His first single topped the charts for six weeks.I'm sorry. Mr. Smith, your request arrived too late to reserve a single.They organize parties for singles.I'd like to break this ten dollar bill into ten singles.The teacher was reluctant to single out individual students for praise or blame.

这封信只用一张纸写成。我想要一个套间,最好是朝南的。每一个孩子都会收到一份礼物淡水对地球上的生命来说是最宝贵的一个要素。他不会长时间保持单身的。如果可能，要一间带浴室的单人房。我要一张今晚去巴黎的单程车票。有两张到利兹的二等的单程票.他的第一首单曲连续上榜六周并且名列前茅。对不起，史密斯先生，您的订房要求来得太迟，单人房已经定完了。他们为单身者组织聚会。我要把这张10元钞票换成10张。老师不愿挑出个别学生来给予表扬或者指责。

translation: vi. 下沉；消沉；渗透vt. 使下沉；挖掘；使低落n. 水槽；洗涤槽；污水坑n. (Sink)人名；(英、瑞典)辛克
examples: Wood does not sink in water, it floats.The boat will sink unless we bail out.The ship was sunk by an enemy torpedo.Rub the cream on your skin and let it sink in.It was several days before the floodwater sank and life returned to normal.They watched the sun sink into the Mediterranean.The dirty dishes are in the sink.The housewife always keeps the sink clean.Power densities that can be tolerated by a gage are strongly related to the specimen which serves as the heat sink.Due to the general derivation, the longitudinal fin arrays on a heat sink can have either square, rectangular, equilaterally triangular, or cylindrical cross section.
木头在水中不沉，而是漂在水面。我们要不把积水清除掉，船就要沉了。这艘船被敌人的鱼雷击沉了。把这种软膏搽在皮肤上，让它渗进去。过了几天洪水才退,生活恢复了正常。他们注视着太阳沉入地中海。那些脏盘子在洗涤槽内。主妇总是保持水槽的清洁。应变片所能允许的电能密度与起着散热器作用的试件密切相关。这个研究是针对纵长型的散热器在已知体积与鳍片数目以及一边的深度，求长方形鳍片的长度与宽度与横截面积。

translation: n. 先生；（用于姓名前）爵士；阁下；（中小学生对男教师的称呼）先生；老师n. （苏丹、德）西尔（人名）
examples: Sir Peter was raised to the peerage.Maybe you could take a seat in the lobby,sir.I am heated and excited, sir, I know I am.But Sir Tim remains optimistic.Sir Willoughby restrained a bound of his body.Sir James will be dining with us tonight.
彼得先生被封为贵族。或许您可以在大堂休息一下，先生。我真又恼火又生气，阁下，我知道我实在气不过。但迪姆阁下保持着他的乐观态度。威洛比爵士拼命遏制自己身体的跳动。詹姆斯爵士今晚将与我们共进晚餐。

translation: n. 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士adj. 姐妹般的；同类型的
examples: Joan and Lily are sisters.You should take care of your niece for the sake of your sister.She looks nothing like her sister.
琼和丽丽是姐妹。看在姐妹的份上，你应该照顾你的侄女。她一点也不像她姐妹

translation: vi. 坐；位于vt. 使就座n. (Sit)人名；(东南亚国家华语)硕；(罗)西特
examples: He sat at his desk working.The students sit in a circle on the floor.There is a sparrow sitting on a branch.Sit yourself down and tell us what happened.Would you like a sit on the deck-chair?Chickens sit on a roost at night.
他坐在桌子旁边工作。学生们在地板上坐成一圈。有只麻雀栖在树枝上。你坐下，告诉我们怎么回事。在躺椅上坐一会儿好吗？鸡夜晚栖息在竿子上。

translation: num. 六，六个n. 六，六个n. (Six)人名；(法、德)西克斯
examples: It is about six o'clock now.The heifer is only six months old.The murder trial lasted six weeks.The tree is said to be six hundred years old.
现在是六点钟左右。这只小母牛只有六个月大。法庭对这一谋杀案的审理为时六周。这树约莫已有600年树龄了。

translation: n. 大小；尺寸adj. 一定尺寸的vt. 依大小排列vi. 可比拟
examples: The size of the apples varied.The company doubled its size in nine years.What size of collar is this shirt?Do you have the same size and design in black?A man's shirt is sized by its neck.
那些苹果大小不同。9年来这家公司的规模扩大了一倍。这衬衣领子的尺寸是多少？这种尺码和款式有黑色的吗?男子的衬衫号码是按领口大小分的。

translation: vi. 滑冰；滑过n. 溜冰；冰鞋n. (Skate)人名；(瑞典、英)斯卡特
examples: In winter, many people skate on the lake.The ice is too thin to skate on.The Dutch often skate along the canals in winter.I can move very fast across the ice on skates.I have bought ice skates to learn to figure skate.
冬天时，许多人在湖上溜冰。冰太薄,不能在上面溜冰。冬天荷兰人经常沿着运河滑冰。我穿着冰鞋在冰上滑得很快。我买了一双花样刀来学习滑冰。

translation: n. 滑雪橇vi. 滑雪adj. 滑雪（用）的
examples: They often go skiing in December.I am learning to ski.The trail can be skied.The girl asked her father to buy a pair of skis for her.I'll have the express delivery service send my ski.The skilful miller killed millions of lions with his ski.The ski hire ranges from fifty to two hundred dollars in this area.
他们经常在十二月份去滑雪。我正在学滑雪。这条小道上可以滑雪。那个女孩请求她的父亲给她买一副滑雪板。滑雪板用快递寄过去吧。技术娴熟的磨坊主用雪橇杀死了上百万头狮子。这个地区的雪橇租金从五十元到二百元不等。

translation: 跳绳用的绳子
examples: The tension was so great that the rope broke.They bound him to a stake with a strong rope.
绳子拉得太紧绷断了。他们用一根结实的绳子将他绑在一根柱子上。

translation: n. 裙子vt. 绕过，回避；位于…边缘vi. 沿边走，绕开；环绕
examples: How many skirts do you have?She tore her skirt on the nail.Her skirt has very exquisite lace.She smoothed down the skirt of her dress.She made a neat row of stitches along the edge of her skirt.You don't want to walk out with your skirt hem tucked or riding up the pannier.There is a rubber skirt round the bottom of a hovercraft.The road skirted the woods.We decided to skirt round the deep jungle.The speech was most disappointing; it skirted round all the main questions.
你有多少条裙子？钉子勾破了她的裙子。她的裙子有非常精致的花边。她把连衣裙的下摆弄平。在裙子的边缘她缝了一排整齐的缝线。相信你也不想当自己走出去是你的裙子边缘折上去或者裙撑缩上去吧。汽垫船底部四周有橡胶护板。这条路环绕林子。我们决定绕过那片茂密的丛林。这篇演讲非常令人失望，它回避了所有主要的问题。

translation: n. 天空；顶点vt. 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高vi. 踢或击高空球；把桨叶翘得过高；飞涨n. (Sky)人名；(英)斯凯
examples: He stared up at the stars twinkling in the sky above him.The sky slowly changed from blue to red.A cloud is a mass of vapor in the sky.Threatening skies portend a storm.I hated waking up to gloomy skies.It is silly of him to take a wild swipe at the ball and sky it mile over the bar.
他抬眼凝视着头顶上方星光闪烁的天空。天空慢慢由蓝色变为红色。云是天空中的水汽团。诡异的天气预示有暴风雨来临。我讨厌在阴沉沉的天气里早早起床。他真傻，猛踢足球，把它高高地踢过了球门。

translation: vi. 睡，睡觉n. 睡眠n. (Sleep)人名；(英)斯利普
examples: I didn't sleep well last night.He have to sleep by day and work by night.He'd been sleeping rough for a week, in ditches and haystacks.I haven't had enough sleep lately.A growing child needs plenty of sleep.Lack of sleep is detrimental to one's health.She stirred now and again in her sleep.A good sleep may help you pick up flesh.
昨晚我睡不安稳。他只好白天睡觉，晚上工作。他在沟里和草堆里露宿了一个星期。最近我睡眠不足。正发育的孩子必须睡眠充足。缺乏睡眠有害健康。她睡觉时不时翻来覆去。好好睡觉可以帮助你病愈后恢复体重。

translation: adj. 慢的；减速的；迟钝的vi. 变慢；变萧条vt. 放慢；阻碍adv. 慢慢地；迟缓地n. (Slow)人名；(英)斯洛
examples: Creeping is a slow method of progression.The slow computer bogged us down.Business is going slow these days.My watch is five minutes slow.You have to slow down your car at the crossing.Slow up while the car is over the bridge.Why Google toolbar slow down my browser?One wants to slow but time does not await him.
爬是一种很慢的行进法。速度慢的计算机阻碍了我们。这些日子，商业活动慢慢减少。我的表慢五分钟。在十字路口, 你得放慢速度。汽车过桥时要放慢速度。为何谷歌快捷方式列会让我的浏览器慢的像乌龟?人欲缓而时不待。

translation: adj. 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的adv. 小小地；卑鄙地n. 小件物品；矮小的人n. (Small)人名；(英)斯莫尔
examples: This coat is too small for me.I need to buy a small transistor radio.The penalty clause was hidden in the small print.She was born in Dominica in the Caribbean and came to Britain as a small child.I can't get by on such a small salary.His words had a small part in her decision making.He played a small part in the play.It's such a small point that it's hardly worth talking about.Many black slaves were flogged to death for quite a small fault.It is small of her to wish for payment.He writes so small I can't read it.He came in，and spoke small to his hatchet men.He felt a sharp pain in the small of his back.

这件上衣对我来说太小了。我需要买一台小的半导体收音机。惩罚条款印在不起眼的小号字体部分。她出生在加勒比海的多米尼加共和国，年幼时来到英国。我薪水这么少无法生活。他的话在她作决定时只起了很少的作用。他在这出戏里演一个小角色。这个问题一点都不重要,都不值得讨论。许多黑奴因一点很小的过失而被鞭打致死。她还希望得到报酬, 真小气。他字写得太小,我看不清。他走了进来,对他的几名职业刺客轻声说了些什么。他感觉后腰一阵剧痛。

translation: vi. 嗅，闻；有…气味vt. 嗅，闻；察觉到；发出…的气味n. 气味，嗅觉；臭味
examples: The strong smell made me throw up.The cheese was emitting a strong smell.Dogs have a keen sense of smell.Hydrogen has no colour, no taste and no smell.Specially-trained dogs can smell out drugs.I could smell that the milk was not fresh.The flowers smell sweet.The fish has begun to smell.The reporter began to smell a good story.
这强烈的气味使我呕吐了。干酪散发出强烈的气味。狗的嗅觉很灵敏。氢气无色、无味、无嗅。受过特殊训练的狗能嗅出毒品。我闻得出牛奶不新鲜。花朵散发芳香。这鱼已经发臭了.那记者意识到要有精彩的报道材料。

translation: vi. 微笑n. 微笑；笑容；喜色vt. 微笑着表示n. (Smile)人名；(塞)斯米莱
examples: A smile often denotes pleasure and friendship.Her smile makes her even more beautiful.The most poor person in the world is the one without smile!When they played out, there was a smile on their faces.She smiled at me.She smiled her approval.She smiled a bitter smile.
微笑常常表示高兴和友善。她的微笑使她更美丽了。世界上最贫穷的人,就是没有笑容的人!当他们演完时, 他们的脸上露出了笑容。她向我微笑。她以微笑表示同意。她苦笑了一下。

translation: n. 烟雾
examples: Black smog reduced visibility to about fifty yards.The smog persisted throughout the day.
黑色的烟雾使能见度降到大约五十码左右。烟雾终日不散。

translation: n. 烟；抽烟；无常的事物vi. 冒烟，吸烟；抽烟；弥漫vt. 吸烟；抽
examples: The stove let out a puff of smoke.The smoke from chimney is spreading out in the sky.The smoke of the burning house could be seen many blocks away.They stopped work to have a smoke.It's against the rules of the school to smoke.You are advised not to smoke during pregnancy.They had to smoke the plants in a greenhouse .The stove is smoking badly.
炉子里冒出一股烟。烟囱冒出的烟正在空中散开。着火的房子的冒出的烟在几个街区外都能看到。他们停下工作吸口烟。吸烟是违反校规的。怀孕期间你最好不要吸烟。他们只好用烟熏温室里的植物。那炉子烟冒得很厉害。

translation: n. 蛇；阴险的人vi. 迂回前进vt. 拉（木材等）；迂回前进
examples: I have a fear of snakes.The snake coiled itself around the tree.The girl screamed at the sight of the snake.He was taken to the hospital to be treated for snake bite.His behavior showed him to be a snake.The river snaked away into the distance.The stream snakes its way across the field.
我害怕蛇。蛇盘绕在树上。那女孩看到蛇就尖叫起来。他因遭蛇咬而被送到医院治疗。他的行为说明他是一个狡诈的人。那条河蜿蜒曲折流向远方。小溪蜿曲折地流过田野。

translation: n. 雪，积雪；下雪vi. 降雪vt. 使纷纷落下；使变白n. (Snow)人名；(英)斯诺
examples: Snow scattered unequally over the mountainside.The compacted snow on the pavement turned to ice.He trudge three hour in the snow to get back home.Last winter the snow lay thick on the ground.Snow is not uncommon during these months.He watched his woods filled up with snow.It was snowing heavily.I have a hunch that it will snow soon.The highway was covered with snow.
雪不均匀地散落在山腰上。人行道上被踩实的雪已变成了冰。他在雪中跋涉三个钟点才回到家。去年冬天，地上积雪很厚。这几个月中下雪并非罕见。他眼看着他的树林渐渐被雪覆盖。天正在下大雪。我有快要下雪的预感。公路被雪覆盖著。

translation: n. 雪人n. (Snowman)人名；(英)斯诺曼
examples: The snowman will melt after the sun comes out.When spring comes, the snowman turns into water.
太阳出来之后，雪人就会融化了。当春天到来的时候，雪人变成了水。

translation: adj. 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的
examples: I can't remember when we had such a snowy day.It's cold and snowy in December.A snowy morning is a theatre of memory.The snowy weather lasted the whole time we were there.
我记不得何时我们曾有过这样多雪的日子了。十二月是寒冷多雪的。下雪的早晨令人浮想联翩。我们在那的整个期间一直都是下雪的天气。

translation: adv. 如此，这么；确是如此conj. 所以；因此pron. 这样n. (So)人名；(柬)索
examples: He felt pity for a man suffering so much.How could you be so stupid as to believe him?Stand with your arms out, so.I gave you a map so you wouldn't get lost.The room was so hot that she felt dizzy.So I really enjoyed my tea just now.No matter who may say so, it is not true.He's always so polite to people.The city enveloped in snow looked so mysterious.These glasses are very expensive, so please be careful with them.It was snowing, and so I could not go out.He ran quickly so as to catch the last bus.Please clear your toys off so that I can study.
他对那个受过那么多痛苦的人感到同情。你怎么这么笨竟相信他的话？两臂伸开站著，就这样。我给你一张地图，这样你就不会迷路了。房间里如此之热,以至于她觉得头晕目眩。所以刚才的茶点我真的很欣赏。不管谁这样说都不是真的。他对人总是非常有礼貌。这座被白雪覆盖著的城市看上去非常神秘。这些玻璃杯十分昂贵,因此请小心些。天在下雪，所以我无法外出。他跑得很快以便赶上那末班车。请把你的玩具清理一下以便我能学习。

translation: n. 英式足球，足球
examples: People love to play soccer.The boy who is speaking to Helen enjoys playing soccer.The Government intends to clamp down on soccer hooliganism.In soccer, only the goal-keeper may play the ball with his hands.The old man put a veto on soccer in his garden.
人们喜欢踢足球。正在跟海伦谈话的那男孩喜爱踢足球。政府拟采取措施严禁在足球比赛中闹事。在足球运动中只有守门员可以用手触球。老人禁止在他的花园里踢足球。

translation: n. 社会；交往；社团；社交界
examples: This event had a pernicious influence on society.The whole fabric of the society was changed by the war.Credit is the life-blood of the consumer society.Can Britain ever be a classless society?They were discussing the problems of Western society.She joined the university art society.She subscribes to an animal protection society.A lot of leaders of society will come to our school next week.They have dropped out of society.Paul spend much time in the society of his friend.
这件事情对社会造成了有害的影响。战争改变了整个社会结构。信誉是消费界的生命线。英国能否有朝一日成为一个无阶级社会?当时他们正在讨论西方社会的问题。她加入了大学里的艺术协会。她捐款给一个动物保护协会。下星期,很多上流社会的顶尖人物会来我们学校。他们已经退出社交圈。保罗花很多时间与他的朋友交往。

translation: n. 短袜；一击vt. 重击；给……穿袜adv. 正着地；不偏不倚地adj. 非常成功的n. (Sock)人名；(德)佐克
examples: There is a hole in my sock.He selected a pair of socks to match his suit.
我的袜子上有个洞。他挑选了一双与他衣服相配的短袜。

translation: n. 软件
examples: There are many sorts of software in my computer.Some publishers are now diversifying into software.We deal in hardware but not software.Her talk ran on developments in computer software.Our English software is an interactive educational software.
我的计算机里有很多软件。有些出版社目前正兼营软件。我们只经营硬件而不经营软件。她谈的是计算机软件的开发问题。我们的英语软件是一种交互式教育软件。

translation: n. 土地；土壤；国家；粪便；务农；温床vt. 弄脏；污辱vi. 变脏
examples: It's rich there because of the fertility of soil.Fertile soil yields good crops.This kind of soil contains much alkali.He transplanted the seedlings into peaty soil.Her slanderous words soiled his reputation.
因为土地肥沃，那儿很富裕。肥沃的土地能种出好庄稼。这种土壤含碱丰富。他把幼苗移栽到含泥炭的土壤里。她中伤性的话损害了他的名誉。

translation: n. 军人；[昆] 兵蚁；懒汉；一片烤面包vi. 当兵；磨洋工；坚持干；假称害病
examples: The soldier received a serious wound on the chest.The trade of the soldier is war.I believe he is meant to be a soldier.A faint-hearted person should not be a soldier.He enlisted as a soldier in the army as soon as he was old enough.He doesn't like the job but he'll soldier on until the work is done.It's hard to soldier on when all you seem to meet is failure and defeat.The bigger the difficulties,the more bravely we'll soldier on.
这名士兵胸部受了重伤。士兵的职业是打仗。我相信他天生是要当军人的。懦弱的人不应该当兵。他年龄一到就入伍当兵了。他虽不喜欢这差事,但他会继续坚持下去,直到做完为止。当你遇到的似乎全是失败和挫折时，要不畏艰难地继续干下去是很难的。困难越大，我们越要顽强地坚持下去。

translation: adj. 一些；某个；大约；相当多的pron. 一些；若干；其中的一部分；（数量不确切时用）有些人adv. 非常；相当；稍微
examples: She won a competition in some newspaper or other.If you save some money each week, we can go on holiday.There is some ice in the bush.Some mail came for you this morning.Some children were playing in the park.Some 40 people attended the rally.That was some twenty years ago.You'll have to study some to catch up with the others.It's going ~ to say he's the best, but he is good.Some of the money was stolen.You'll find some in the cupboard.Thirty people came. Some stayed until the end but many left early.
她参加某报纸举办的比赛获胜。要是你每星期能存点儿钱，咱们就可以外出度假了。树丛里有些冰。今天上午有你的邮件。有些小孩儿在公园里玩儿.大约有40个人参加了集合那大约是20年前。你必须多下功夫才能赶上别人。说他是最好的那是夸大其词,但他是蛮好的。有些钱给偷走了。柜橱里有一些。来了三十人 有些人一直呆到最后

translation: n. 大人物；重要人物pron. 有人；某人
examples: Somewhere somebody sometimes does something good.Since somebody let the gardener go.Somebody has poked a hole in the paper screen.Somebody gave me a ticket for a pop concert.I reasoned that somebody important must have been at the other end of the line.
在某处某人有时做某些好事。某人让园丁卷铺盖了。有人在那个纸屏风上戳了个洞。有人给了我一张通俗音乐会的票。我揣摩着这件事的背后必定有重要人物在指挥。

examples: The camera filmed someone leaping into the house.Someone tried to poison our dog.I seem to hear someone knocking at the door.
照相机拍到了某人突然跳入那房子的画面。有人想毒杀我们的狗。我好像听到有人在敲门。

translation: pron. 某事；某物n. 重要的人；值得重视的事adv. 非常；有点；大约adj. 大约；有点象
examples: I think I dropped something.I'll try and rustle you up something to eat.I can predict something with great accuracy.He thinks he's something.He hit a tree or something.It is something between a jug and a vase.She is thirty-something.The parcel was ten pounds something.He is something like his brother.It rained something awful last night.
我想我掉了东西。我设法给你弄点吃的。我能很准确地预测某事。他认为他了不起。他撞上了一棵树或其他什么东西。这东西既象瓦罐又象花瓶。她三十几岁。这包裹有十磅左右。他有点象他哥哥。昨晚雨下得很大。

老人有时爱忘事。有时这个病人疼得哭起来。人们往往认为爱情和事业是并驾齐驱的。她间或透过窗帘的缝隙能瞥见手电筒的闪光。

translation: adv. 在某处；到某处n. 某个地方
examples: Somewhere somebody sometimes does something good.I must have seen you somewhere before.There is no one but wishes to get somewhere.He was a thinnish fellow, somewhere in his forties.Somewhere somebody sometimes does something good.Somewhere along the way I lost my umbrella.
在某处某人有时做某些好事。我以前一定在某处见过你。没有人不希望将来能有所成就。他瘦瘦的，大约四十多岁。在某处某人有时做某些好事。我把雨伞丢失在沿途某处了。

translation: n. 儿子；孩子（对年轻人的称呼）；男性后裔n. (Son)人名；(土、老、柬)松；(法、罗)索恩；(日)存(名)；(日)孙(姓)；(越)山

他妻子给他生了一个儿子。我的小儿子喜欢对我玩恶作剧。我最近没听到我儿子的任何音讯。美国深深地感谢你,孩子。孩子，我希望你能大有作为！相信美国佬队吧,孩子。

translation: n. 歌曲；歌唱；诗歌；鸣声n. (Song)人名；(泰)颂；(柬)松；(英)桑；(老)宋；(越)双；(东南亚国家华语)松
examples: The song has plaintive melody.I woke up and was greeted by bird song.The song of birds heralds spring.He was awakened by the song of birds in the trees.
这首歌曲的曲调悲伤。我一觉醒来，鸟鸣之声不绝于耳。鸟儿的歌唱预报春到。他被林中的鸟鸣声闹醒。

我马上回来。她很快就到，比你预料的要早。他一听到这事儿就走了。那名侦探很快就于真相大白。她很快就到，比你预料的要早。你要多长时间才能准备好?

translation: adj. 遗憾的；对不起的，抱歉的int. 对不起，抱歉（表示委婉的拒绝等）

太对不起了，我今天不能见你。我很抱歉在这个时候打扰你。别再为那打破的杯子难过了。遗憾的是他没能经常写信。对不起，你这样尺寸的衬衣都卖完了。

translation: 马马虎虎；勉强过得去

我觉得写了很漂亮的文章，应该得最高分数，但总是得回个一般般的成绩。

translation: vt. 听（诊）；测量，测…深；使发声；试探；宣告n. 声音，语音；噪音；海峡；吵闹；听力范围；[医] 探条adj. 健全的，健康的；合理的；可靠的；有效彻底的adv. 彻底地，充分地vi. 听起来；发出声音；回响；测深
examples: The man was gone: his footsteps made no sound.I caught a curious sound in the neighboring room.He plays an original jazz-gospel sound.The bell gave forth a peasant, lingering sound.They had a wonderful time by the sound of it.From the sound of things you were lucky to find him.You sound a little down in dumps.As fun as that may sound, it may be uncomfortable for some of us.Together we had done our best to sound the alarm.You don't sound the "b" in the word "comb".There are possible risks, but nonetheless, we feel it's a sound investment.His argument is basically sound.The system is both practical and ecologically sound.He has a sound grasp of the issues.The doctors made a thorough examination on Mary and found her pretty sound.They have got home safe and sound.With heavy rain falling all night, she had a sound sleep.He slept sound in his mother's cradle song.

那人走了,他的脚步没有发出一点声音。我听到隔壁房间里有奇怪的响声。他演奏了一曲自己独创的爵士福音。钟奏起了悠扬悦耳的曲调。听起来他们好像过得很愉快。看起来你能找到他真是幸运。你听起来好象情绪有点低落。这个感觉很好玩,不过可能有些人觉得不舒服。我们曾一同竭尽全力发出过警报。在“comb”这个单词里,字母“b”不发音。有可能存在危险,但是我们仍然感到这是可靠的投资。他的论点基本上是合理的。这个系统不但切合实际，从生态学观点来看也是合理的。他对这些问题掌握得很全面。医生们对玛丽作了彻底的检查,发现她健康情况良好。他们已平安到家。尽管大雨下了一夜,她还是睡得很香。他在母亲唱的摇篮曲中酣然入睡。

translation: n. 汤，羹；马力vt. 加速；增加马力

他建议我们往南走。他们住在一间面南的房间里。湿润的风从南方吹来。他习惯于南方温暖的气候。每年冬季大量的鸟类迁徙南方。今年冬天我们要去南方旅行。鸟儿飞向南方寻找温暖的阳光。

这里有很大的活动空间。我只有一间很小的办公室。导弹被发射升空。小型汽车比较容易找到停车空地。孩子们的空闲时间很少,私人空间也非常小。把你的名字和地址写在下面的空格里。这么短的时间内取得这样的成就,真是了不起。写字的时候要把字均匀地隔开。我打算在5年内分期付款。请再说一遍,我刚刚走了一会儿神。我完全忘了数学作业。

这儿有人会说英语吗？我还是有能力把话说清楚的，谢谢你吧。病人太衰弱了，不能说话。今晚他将在广播中演说。那个演说家要讲话，但是群众却用笑加以阻止。请针对讨论的问题发言。这是我第一次在公共场合发言。

她是我一个特别的朋友。我们给予老顾客特别的优惠。如果需要,告诉我们您的特殊要求。这是个特殊的案件，应该获得特殊处理。但在驾驶公共汽车之前,他们必须通过一项专门测验。今年又很多针对儿童的特别的电视圣诞节目。今晚第八频道有电视特别节目。当天的风味菜是烤猪肉。现在他们的进口啤酒特价出售。

translation: vi. 超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆n. 速度，速率；迅速，快速；昌盛，繁荣vt. 加快…的速度；使成功，使繁荣n. (Speed)人名；(英)斯皮德

translation: vt. 拼，拼写；意味着；招致；拼成；迷住；轮值n. 符咒；一段时间；魅力vi. 拼字；轮替n. (Spell)人名；(英)斯佩尔

我不会拼写你的名字。你会拼写“metropolis”这个词吗?她的书写很工整，但是她不会拼写。把它们拼在一起C-A-T拼成cat。他们所作的不明智的投资可能导致经济上的损失。我最好代替米奇几个小时。这女巫使公主中了巫术，沉睡了十年。你能感受到音乐的神奇魔力吗？她在医院住了一段时间后，很快又回来上班了。看样子要过一段寒潮天气。她感到一阵头晕，但不一会儿就好了。据说轮班还要持续6天。

translation: vt. 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽vi. 花钱；用尽，耗尽n. 预算

用于高等教育的平均支出是每人55英镑。新法律将限制政府开支。我每天上下班乘车花费的时间加起来有3个小时。你真不该在这件事上花费这么大的精力。我们不能浪费钱财。你业余时间怎么打发？牛仔大部分时间都是在户外度过的。

translation: n. 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒vt. 鼓励；鼓舞；诱拐
examples: He is endued with a spirit of public service.We need a spirit of enterprise if we are to overcome our difficulties.Now the rat of Panic was gnawing at Byron's spirit.Music lifted up the listening spirit.It will evaporate like a spirit.They believe that his spirit lives on after death.She did not turn into foam. She became a spirit of the air and was happy at last.The boss is being in royal spirits right now.The holiday gave him back his good spirits.You must keep your father off strong spirits.The restaurant is not licensed for selling spirits.
他富有为公众服务的精神。如果我们要克服困难，我们就要有进取精神。如今恐慌正象耗子一样在啃啮拜伦的心灵。音乐净化升华了倾听它的心灵。它将来总要像幽灵一样化成云烟。他们相信他死后灵魂还活着。她没有变成泡沫.此刻，老板情绪极好。假期使他恢复了愉快的情绪。你必须让你父亲戒绝烈酒。这家饭店没有卖烈酒的许可证。

translation: vi. 吐痰；吐口水；发出劈啪声vt. 吐，吐出；发出；发射n. 唾液
