玛丽喊叫时唾沫四溅。因为高原上下着小雨。这块牛肉在烤肉叉上烤得很好。这孩子长得活象他父亲。我有个朋友长得与你像极了。这辆汽车需要擦洗一下。那些男孩子向火车窗外吐口水。在公共场合随便吐痰是不礼貌的。保姆叫孩子把果核吐出来。婴儿打嗝时总会吐出一点东西来。她恼怒得几乎无法骂出那句充满恨意的话来。大雨已经停了，但是还在飘著小雨。把羊肉叉在这根棍子上，在火上翻烤。

translation: n. 匙，勺子；一杓的量vt. 用匙舀；使成匙状vi. 轻轻向上击
examples: The spoon has been rusty from disuse.His soup spoon dropped onto the ground.She was born with a silver spoon in her mouth.You need a spoon to beat the mixture smooth.He spooned up several cakes of cube sugar and stuffed them into his mouth.The young couple spoon all the time.
汤匙因弃置不用而生锈了。他的汤勺掉到了地上。她生来富贵。你需要用一把调羹来搅均混合液。他舀起了几块方糖,然后把它们全都塞进了嘴里。一对年轻人,常在调情求爱。

translation: n. 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑vi. 游戏vt. 游戏；参加体育运动；夸耀adj. 运动的
examples: Baseball is more popular than any other sport in Japan.Football is my favorite sport.Sport is being debased by commercialism.This sport event attracted many advertisers.Don't sport with her， she's an old-fashioned girl.They sport in the mancipatory possession of their gold.Jump into the extreme sport of Skydiving.Business is a combination of war and sport.
在日本，棒球比其他任何运动都受人欢迎。足球是我最喜欢的运动。体育运动的价值受商业化的影响而逐渐下降。这个体育项目吸引了许多广告客户。别跟她开玩笑,她是个古板的姑娘。她们在炫耀她们可以转让的黄金。跳转到极限运动的跳伞运动。商业是战争和运动的混合体。

translation: n. 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃adj. 春天的vi. 生长；涌出；跃出；裂开vt. 使跳起；使爆炸；突然提出；使弹开n. (Spring)人名；(德)施普林；(英、芬、瑞典)斯普林
examples: Spring is here.It can be quite windy there, especially in spring.When the box was opened, the spring jumped out.There is too much spring in this bed.The cat made a spring at the mouse.The spring water is cold and crystal-clear.An ill marriage is a spring of ill fortune.The cat crouched ready to spring.A clown will spring from the box.Spring to attention when the captain enters.I hate to spring this on you at such short notice.Why should you spring my cricket bat?The barrel began to spring a leak.He'd only get a mouthpiece to spring him.Out of the sluice springs an inexhaustible supply of water.The wheat is beginning to spring up.Many new factories have sprung up in my home town.The northwest wind will spring up this evening.

春天来了。那里有时容易刮风,特别在春季。盒子一打开，弹簧就绷出来了。这张床太有弹性。猫向老鼠扑去。泉水清冽。不良的婚姻是恶运的来源。那猫躬起背准备跳。盒子里会弹出个小丑来。上尉一进来，就要迅速立正站好。很抱歉，向你突如其来提出这件事。你干吗非弄弯我的板球拍呢?那个木桶开始破裂泄漏了。他只要找个辩护律师,就能把他释放出来。水从水闸中源源流出。小麦正开始迅速生长。我的家乡建了许多工厂。今天傍晚将开始刮西北风。

translation: adj. 平方的；正方形的；直角的；正直的vt. 使成方形；与…一致vi. 一致；成方形n. 平方；广场；正方形adv. 成直角地
examples: The little girl drew a square on the paper.Everybody goes to this vast square in the evening.The crowds in the square were elated by the news.25 is a perfect square of 5.The carpenter who built this room must have lost his square.I'm basically a bit of a square.A handkerchief is usually square.I remembered he'd been top of his class, so he was bound to have grown up into a square workaholic.A strong square jaw is a sign of firm character.The mayor is a man of square frame.I ask no odds, I just want you to be fair and square.They offered to buy his farm but met a square refusal.His conduct does not square with his words.I must square my account with you.There is only one person besides ourselves who knows anything about this affair, and it shouldn't be difficult to square him.Square the page off with your ruler.3 squared is 9.Dear, you have to square your way to eat.The road turned square to the left.

小女孩在纸上画了一个正方形。每天傍晚，人人都上这宽阔的广场上来。这消息使广场上的人群欢欣鼓舞。25是5的完全平方。建这座房子的人一定丢了他的直角尺。我是比较古板的。手帕通常是正方形的。我记得他以前一直是班上的尖子,所以他一定长成了个古板的工作狂。强健的方颚是性格坚定的象征。市长是个体格魁梧的人。我不要求特殊照顾,我只要求您公正。他们出价要买他的农场，但遭到断然拒绝。他言行不一致。我必须和你结清我的帐目。除了我们自己,只有一个人知道这件事,收买他应该不难。用尺在这页纸上打上方格。3的平方是9。亲爱的，你得改一下你吃饭的姿势。这条路成直角向左转去。

translation: n. 邮票；印记；标志；跺脚vt. 铭记；标出；盖章于…；贴邮票于…；用脚踩踏vi. 跺脚；捣碎；毁掉n. (Stamp)人名；(德)施坦普；(英)斯坦普
examples: My husband is a stamp collector.He is looking for his rubber stamp.Please bring a photograph of yourself.We have to affix a stamp on the corner of it.His face bears the stamp of suffering.Your stamp of impatience won't give me a scare.She stamped on the insect and killed it.The immigration officer stamped my passport.
我丈夫是个集邮者。他正在找他的橡皮印章。请带一张你的照片来,我们要在它的角上盖个印儿。他的脸上有饱经苦难的烙印。你那不耐烦的跺脚吓不了我。她踩死了一只虫子。移民官员在我的护照上盖了戳。

translation: vi. 站立；位于；停滞vt. 使站立；忍受；抵抗n. 站立；立场；看台；停止
examples: I don't think the chair is firm enough to stand on.I twisted my ankle, and I couldn't stand up.She is funny, but I can't stand her.Several pine trees stand erect on the hillside.The car stood at the traffic lights for a few moments, then moved off.He took his stand near the window.He set up a stand on the market.They made a stand and took a rest.Hundreds of people were squeezed up against each other in one corner of the stand.
我觉得这椅子不够稳固,不能站人。我的脚踝扭伤,简直无法站起来。她滑稽,但我无法忍受她。几棵青松挺立在山坡上。那辆汽车在交通灯前停了一会儿,然后驶去了。他站在窗旁。他在市场上设了个摊床。他们停下来休息一下。数百人挤在看台的一角。

translation: n. 星，恒星；明星；星形物vt. 用星号标于；由…主演，由…担任主角vi. 担任主角adj. 明星的，主角的；星形的n. (Star)人名；(瑞典)斯塔尔；(德)施塔尔
examples: A lonely star shone out against the black sky.This star is not visible to the naked eye.The opera star wanted in her later years.Her ambition was to become a film star.The cast of the play included a international star.The star actor was ill, so his understudy had to alternate for him.
一颗孤星在黑色的夜空中闪闪发亮。这颗星肉眼看不见。那位歌剧明星晚年生活困苦。她一心追求的是做电影明星。这个剧的演员名单中有一位国际明星。这位明星演员病了，因而他的替角必须代他演出。

translation: vt. 开始；启动vi. 出发n. 开始；起点
examples: It started to rain.I used to start work at 9 o'clock every day.We are just about to start.She started at the sound of my voice.He knew from the start the idea was hopeless.What a start you gave me!He has a good start in business.The money gave him just the start he needed.
下起雨来了.我过去常在每天9：00开始工作。我们正要出发。她听到了我的声音，蓦地一惊。一开始他就知道这主意行不通。你吓了我一大跳！他在生意上起步时占了很大的优势。这笔钱正是他起步所需要的。

translation: n. 车站；驻地；地位；身份vt. 配置；安置；驻扎
examples: Don't forget to drop by at the gas station.He was walking up and down the station platform.Can you tell me the way to the railway station?Which TV station is the programme on?He has ideas above his station.He's returning to his army station.One of the warships was out of station.Guards were stationed around the prison.You must station some additional men on the island in case of trouble.You should station a guard at the gate.
别忘了到煤气站去看看。他在火车站的月台上走来走去。你能告诉我往火车站的路怎么走吗？这个节目在哪家电视台播放?他的思想超越了自己的地位。他准备回驻地。有一艘军舰未在其编队位置。卫兵派驻在监狱四周。你们必须再派一些士兵驻扎在岛上以防出乱子。你应该在门口设置一个警卫员。

translation: n. 女政治家；有治国才能的女子
examples: She was an outstanding stateswoman in feudal times...Wu Zetian was an outstanding stateswoman in Chinese history.Germany's first woman leader is known as a brave and down-to-earth stateswoman.She is a fine stateswoman, and many people regard her as the architect of the national welfare.Wu Zetian was the only empress in China's history. She was an outstanding stateswoman in feudal times...She entered the political arena at the age of 25, who was a fine stateswoman, and many people regarded her as the architect of the national welfare.
她善于用人，把整个国家管理得井井有条，是... 武则天是中国历史上杰出的女政治家。 德国的首位女总理被称为是勇敢和脚踏实地的女政治家。 她是一位非常优秀的政治家，许多人把她视为现代福利国家的设计师。 武则天是中国历史上惟一的女皇帝，她是封建时代杰出的女政治家。她善于用人，把整个国家管理得井井有条，是... 她二十五岁就进入了政界，被认为是一位非常优秀的政治家，许多人把她视为现代福利国家的设计师。

translation: vi. 停留；坚持；暂住；停下vt. 坚持；暂住；抑制n. 逗留；停止；支柱
examples: I stayed late at the party last night.You can stay at home and watch TV.Why don't you come to stay with us next time you visit Durham?The temperature has stayed hot this week.We must be able to stay impartial at all times.He went straight to New York without a stay in Hongkong.He made few friends during his stay in the village.
昨晚我在晚会上呆到很晚。你可以待在家里并且看电视。下次来达勒姆就住在我们这儿好吗?本周气温一直都很热。我们必须经常保持公正的态度。他直接去了纽约,没在香港停留。他在这个村子逗留的期间，没有交上几个朋友。

translation: vt. 剽窃；偷偷地做；偷窃vi. 窃取；偷偷地行动；偷垒n. 偷窃；便宜货；偷垒；断球
examples: He was sent into prison for stealing.He stole a glance at the pretty girl across the table.Despite fine acting by several well-known stars, it was a young newcomer who stole the show.The number of book steal from the library is large.Ladies and gentlemen, it's a steal at only $50.'
他由于偷窃被送入监狱。他偷偷地看了一眼桌子对面那个漂亮的女孩。尽管几位名角演出都很出色,却未曾想竟让一名新秀抢尽风头。图书馆遗失的书很多。｀女士们、 先生们，这个只卖50美元，太便宜啦.

translation: adj. 陡峭的；不合理的；夸大的；急剧升降的vt. 泡；浸；使…充满vi. 泡；沉浸n. 峭壁；浸渍
examples: This hill is too steep to ride up on a bicycle.The last part of the ascent is very steep.The bus toiled up the steep hill.It’s priced at fifty pounds, and I think that’s a bit steep for a secondhand lawn mower.
这山太陡了，骑自行车可上不去。最后一段上坡路很陡。公共汽车艰难地爬上陡峭的山岗。那东西标价50英镑，而我认为对于一部二手货的割草机来说，那个价钱不合理。

translation: n. 步，脚步；步骤；步伐；梯级vi. 踏，踩；走vt. 走，迈步
examples: The government is taking steps to control the rising crime rate.We should take steps to prevent war.However, the next step can be started.They are not attached to the fruits of karma, and are but one step from Buddhahood.Today, the focus of grid computing development has moved up a step, to the application level.This dance step is quite complicated.One dancer was fractionally out of step.He bounced into the room with a springy step.She runs up the stairs with a light graceful step.She stepped on a loose stone and twisted her ankle.I hope you try to get them to step up production.She can keep calmed and step back.He is not ready to step down yet.Kindly step this way, ladies and gentlemen.You cannot step twice into the same river.

政府正采取措施以控制不断上升的犯罪率。我们应当采取措施制止战争。然而,下一步骤可以开始。他们不附上因果报应的果实,而只是成佛的一个台阶。今天,网格计算开发的中心已经迈上了一个新的台阶,来到了应用程序的层次上。这个舞步挺复杂的。有个跳舞人的舞步稍微有些不合拍。他以轻快的跑步跳进房间。她以轻快优雅的步子奔上楼去。她踩到一块松动的石头上，扭伤了脚踝。希望你们尽力使厂家增加生产。她能够保持冷静后退一步来思考问题他还不准备辞职。女士们、 先生们，请往这边走。你不能两次踏入同一条河流。

translation: vt. 刺，戳；伸出；粘贴vi. 坚持；伸出；粘住n. 棍；手杖；呆头呆脑的人n. (Stick)人名；(芬)斯蒂克
examples: A walking stick is a must for me now.We made the fire out of dry sticks.Hold the stick against crosswind.A pin stuck me in the hand.Stick the fork into the potato.His hair sticks up.Please help me to stick up the board on the big box.He sticked by his beliefs.We must stick to our policy.Stick a label on your suitcase.
如今我行走离不开手杖了。我们用干柴枝来生火。向侧风方向压住杆。一根针刺入我的手。用叉子插土豆。他的头发竖起来。请帮助我把木板钉在那个大木箱上。他坚持自己的信念。我们必须坚持我们的政策。把标签粘贴在你的手提箱上。

translation: adv. 仍然；更；静止地adj. 静止的，不动的；寂静的，平静的；不起泡的n. 寂静；剧照；蒸馏室conj. 仍然；但是；尽管如此vt. 蒸馏；使…静止；使…平静下来vi. 静止；平静；蒸馏n. (Still)人名；(英、芬、瑞典)斯蒂尔；(德)施蒂尔
examples: Beware of silent dog and still water.The room was still at the end of the speech.Although she felt ill, she still went to work.Although he is eighty,he is still very much alive.The whole world stood still righ there.The food stilled the baby's cries.
提防不吠的犬,小心静止的水。演讲结束的时候，房间里寂静无声。她虽然觉得身体不舒服，但仍然去上班了。他虽有八十岁了,但仍然充满了活力。全世界在这时静止了。食物使婴儿停止了哭泣。

translation: n. 长袜n. (Stocking)人名；(英)斯托金
examples: I ripped my stocking on a nail.The thief masked his face with a stocking.The boy is one meter tall in his stocking feet.
一个钉子挂破了我的袜子。那贼套上长筒袜遮住脸。这个小男孩不穿鞋的身高是一米。

translation: vt. 停止；堵塞；断绝vi. 停止；中止；逗留；被塞住n. 停止；车站；障碍；逗留
examples: The train stopped at the station.His heart has stopped.They would stop the rich from robbing the poor.I only just managed to stop myself from shouting at him.They stopped to talk when they met on the street.I am going to stop over at New York City.They put a stop to the evils.The red light is a warning sign for stop.They had a stop for a few days in New York.She is likely to be waiting us at the bus stop.
火车在车站上停了下来。他的心脏停止了跳动。他们要制止富人掠夺穷人。我极力控制住自己没对他喊叫起来。他们在街上相遇时，停下来聊了几句。我打算在纽约中途停留。他们杜绝了这些坏事。红灯是警告停止行进的信号。他们在纽约逗留了几天。她可能已在车站等着呢。

translation: n. 商店；储备，贮藏；仓库vt. 贮藏，储存n. (Store)人名；(德)施托雷
examples: The fire was so damaging that the store had to close its doors.He always keeps several cases of wine in store.She has acquired such a vast store of knowledge.This reservoir is used to store water for our town.The barn can store five tons of grain.Enter your password and store the key file.
火灾造成的损失太严重， 这个商店不得不停业。他总是备有几箱酒。她的知识面非常广。这个水库是用来为我们小镇储存水的。这个谷仓能放五吨粮食。输入您的密码并保存密钥文件。

translation: n. 暴风雨；大动荡vi. 起风暴；横冲直撞；狂怒咆哮vt. 猛攻；怒骂n. (Storm)人名；(瑞典)斯托姆；(德)施托姆；(英、西、芬)斯托姆
examples: In the storm I took shelter under the tree.A storm arose during the night.The clouds threatened a big storm.Help was lacking at sea during the storm.At that time he didn't have the guns to storm the headquarters.He stormed about the house, breaking things.
暴风雨时，我正在树下躲避。夜间起风暴了。乌云预示着暴风雨即将来临。起风暴时海上无处可求援。那个时候他没有枪支去武力夺取司令部。他在房子里暴跳如雷，乱摔东西。

translation: n. 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话vt. 用历史故事画装饰vi. 说谎n. (Story)人名；(英)斯托里
examples: The story stirred her sympathy.The story took place in a serene summer night.This novel has been developed out of a folk story.He took the girl in with his stories.The boy's story has some colour of truth.He will break the story tomorrow morning.The book is recommended for its interesting story.That is a house of six stories.
这故事激起了她的同情心。故事发生在一个宁静的夏夜。这部小说脱胎于民间传说。他用一套谎言蒙骗了那个女孩。这男孩的一番叙述听来似乎是真的。他明天上午将发表这篇新闻报道。这本书由于其故事情节生动有趣而受推荐。那是一栋六层楼的房子。

translation: adj. 直的；连续的；笔直的；正直的；整齐的；异性恋的adv. 直接地；不断地；立即；坦率地n. 直；直线；直男，直女，异性恋者n. (Straight)人名；(英)斯特雷特
examples: Light travels in straight lines.I want a straight answer to the question.John Wayne was a blunt talker and straight shooter.He is as straight as an arrow.I guide you in the way of wisdom and lead you along straight paths.He gave us a straight trip.He was sick for five straight days.For seven straight seasons, he led the NBA in scoring.Michael, who pretends to be straight, unexpectedly runs into Tracy in front of a gay bar.The smoke rose straight up.The car was coming straight at me.The liner flew straight to Nanjing.You can go straight to the zoo by bus.We'll pick you up and head straight to the airport.The liner flew straight to Nanjing.I don't think one does any good if one works straight through.

光是沿直线传播。我想提问和回答都要直截了当。约翰·韦恩是一个直言不讳、一针见血的人。他是个正直的人。我已指教你走智慧的道,引导你行正直的路。他给我们一个准确的内部消息。他连续病了四天。他连续七个赛季都是NBA得分最多的球员。假装是异性恋的迈克尔在一家同性酒吧外遇见了特雷西。烟直直地上升。这辆车径直地向我驶来。客机直达南京。你乘公共汽车就可以直接到达动物园。我们回来接你,然后直接开往机场。客机直达南京。我认为一个人只是一个劲地埋头工作是没有什么好处的。

translation: adj. 奇怪的；陌生的；外行的adv. 奇怪地；陌生地，冷淡地n. (Strange)人名；(英)斯特兰奇；(瑞典、塞)斯特朗格
examples: It seemed strange that she would leave so early.He had a strange expression on his face.What strange clothes you're wearing!He stood in a strange street.He is still strange to the work.Not being able to speak the language made me feel strange.She said that she felt strange.
奇怪的是她竟然走的这么早。他脸上呈现出奇怪的表情。你穿的衣服真特别!他站在一条陌生的街道上。他对这项工作仍很生疏。由于不会说那种语言, 我感到很不自在。她说她觉得不舒服。

translation: n. 街道adj. 街道的n. (Street)人名；(英、葡)斯特里特；(德)施特雷特
examples: I met him in the street.He stood in a strange street.This street is four times shorter than that one.The troops walked in procession through the street.I bought this loaf of bread in the chain store opposite the street.They crossed the street and went into the shop.He beckoned to me from across the street.Taking a blind man across the street is a kind act.I like to buy a street map of the city.
我在街上遇到他。他站在一条陌生的街道上。这条街道比那条短四倍。军队排成队伍走过街道。我在街道对面的连锁商店里买了这只面包。他们穿过街道，进了商店。他在马路对面向我招手致意。扶盲人过马路是一种善良的行为。我想买一张这个城市的街道地图。

translation: adj. 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的adv. 强劲地；猛烈地n. (Strong)人名；(英)斯特朗
examples: A strong light impinged on his eyes.She has a strong desire to become a writer.Such tendentious statements are likely to provoke strong opposition.He has a very strong will.I was surprised to find that the strong man liked to eat conserves.Hurricane is a storm with a very strong fast wind.The North Pole has a strong magnetic force.He was acquitted in default of strong evidence of his guilt.The scholar's influence is still strong though he has been dead for forty years.He was a man of strong conviction.The rose sends out strong fragrance.The strong smell is acted as one way of self-protection.You must make the houses as strong as possible.There is a strong presumption that he will succeed.I'm not very strong on dates.She is not strong in English.There was a strong police presence at the demonstration.Hong Kong's banks have maintained a strong presence in the Mainland.The source of the problem resides in the fact that the currency is too strong.Their catering business remained strong despite the recession.You shouldn't use such strong language.

一道强烈的光刺着他的眼睛。她有成为作家的强烈愿望。这种有倾向性的说法可能招致强烈的反对。他意志很坚强。我很惊讶地发现这个强壮的男人喜欢吃蜜饯。飓风是一种强劲猛烈的风暴。北极具有强大的磁力。因无确凿证据而判他无罪。尽管已经逝世四十年了，这位学者的影响力仍然很大。他是一个信仰坚定的人。玫瑰散发出浓郁的香味。这种花发出的浓烈气味是自我保护的一种手段。你应该把房屋建得尽可能结实。他有很大的成功希望。我不善于和异性朋友约会。她英语不好。示威现场出现了大批警察。香港的银行在内地建立了稳固的基础。问题的根源在于货币过于坚挺。尽管出现经济衰退，他们的酒席承办业仍然景气。你不应该使用这样强硬的措词。

translation: n. 学生；学者n. (Student)人名；(德)施图登特
examples: A student should always be curious to learn.A young student fainted in the hot sun.John is more diligent than any other student in his class.Such a good student as he (is) will succeed.How many students are there in your class?He is a student of international politics.He became an ardent student of Marxism during college.
学生应该始终具有强烈的求知欲。有个年幼的学生在炎炎烈日下晕倒了。约翰比班上其他的同学用功。像他这样的好学生一定会成功。你们班有多少个学生？他是研究国际政治的学者。在大学里他成了热诚的马克思主义学者。

translation: n. 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问vt. 学习；考虑；攻读；细察vi. 研究；用功n. (Study)人名；(英)斯塔迪
examples: This reference book is very useful to our study.He persisted in the study of law.His years of study were useful in his job.Physiology is the study of how living things work.She secludes herself in her study to work.She stood there in a brown study.Harry was a confounded slow study.He is a quick study.Scientists are studying the photographs of Mars for signs of life.I like to study in the library.She has been awarded a scholarship to study at Harvard.He studied himself in the mirror.He always studied to avoid disagreeable topics.
这本参考书对我们的研究很有用。他坚持学习法律。他多年的学习有助于他的工作。生理学是研究生物功能的学科。她把自己关在书房里埋头研究。她站在那里沉思默想。哈里是一个记忆力差透了的人。他很快就能背诵出台词。科学家们正在研究火星的照片，寻求生命的迹象。我喜欢在图书馆学习。她获得了去哈佛大学读书的奖学金。他对着镜子端详自己。他总是努力避免不愉快的话题。

translation: n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的vt. 使…隶属；使屈从于…
examples: She dare not mention the subject again.Mathematics is her favorite subject.He is said to be writing a paper on this subject.Hawthorne concedes that normal life can be a subject for art.Art is the object of feeling, and the subject of nature.The subject of a sentence and its verb must agree in number.We need some male subjects for a psychology experiment.Mary is very subject to colds.Students should be subject to the discipline of their university.Ancient Rome subjected most of EuropeAncient Rome subjected most of EuropeHe was subjected to the harshest possible conditions
她不敢重提那个话题。数学是她喜欢的科目。据说他正在写一篇关于这个主题的论文。霍桑承认日常生活可以作为艺术的题材。艺术是情感的客观表现。也是本性的主观反映。句子的主语和动词的数必须一致。我们需要几个男子作心理学实验对象。玛丽很容易患感冒。学生们应该服从学校的纪律。古罗马帝国征服了欧洲大部分。古罗马帝国征服了欧洲大部分。他遭遇了最艰苦的条件。

translation: n. 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物
examples: She is responsible for the character part of the hero's devoted mother.The school has only been open for six months, so it's hard to evaluate its success.I am very heartened by her success in the election.He wasn't a success as a teacher.His new book was a great success.
她负责这个主人公的忠诚的母亲的角色部分。该学校仅开办了六个月, 现在还很难估计它的成就。她在竞选中获胜令我大受鼓舞。他不是个好教师。他的新书获得了巨大的成功。

translation: adj. 这样的，如此的n. (Such)人名；(英)萨奇；(德)祖赫
examples: He said he hadn't got time or made some such excuse.Such a disaster as her car being stolen had never happened before.He had never before gazed on such splendour.I've never seen such beautiful scenery.He's such a good swimmer that he makes me look sick.He did not oppose the scheme as such.Such are the fortunes of war.
他说他没有时间, 或是找诸如此类的借口。有的祸事，像她的汽车被盗之类，以前从未发生过。他生平从未见过如此壮观的场面。我从没见过这样美丽的景色。他游得这么好，真叫我相形见绌。他并不反对那项方案本身。这些就是战争的机会

translation: n. 糖；食糖；甜言蜜语vt. 加糖于；粉饰vi. 形成糖n. (Sugar)人名；(英)休格
examples: I bought him a packet of sugar.He put some sugar into his coffee.If the lemonade tastes bitter,sugar it.Shall I sugar the milk for you?The pill is sugared.
我给他买了一袋糖果。他往咖啡里加了些糖。如果柠檬水发苦，就加糖。我给你的牛奶加糖吗?这药丸加上了糖衣。

translation: vt. 适合；使适应n. 诉讼；恳求；套装，西装；一套外衣vi. 合适；相称
examples: It is the convention for men to wear suits on formal occasions.He was dressed in a quiet grey suit and looked very well bred and every inch a gentleman.She filed a suit against the college for sex discrimination.I do not know the first thing about the law suit.He discontinued a civil suit.The government granted the minority group's suit for autonomy.Under the new procedure there is no serious problem if the legal and equitable claims in the same suit are independent and unrelated.I don't know what profession would suit me.The coat doesn't suit you.If we met at 2, would that suit you?Manhood made the arrangement to suit herself economically most desirable from her point of view.The range of colour, pattern and texture is wide enough to suit every one's needs and taste.To suit specific requirements, you can add, delete, or even rearrange the order of the bricks in a firewall.

男子在正式场合穿套装是一种社会习俗。他身着素灰色套装，看上去很有涵养，一副绅士派头。她对那所大学提出性别歧视的诉讼。我一点儿也知道这件诉讼案的事。他撤回了他的诉讼。政府批准了这一少数民族申请自治的请求。如果在同一诉讼中，法律上的和衡平法上的诉讼请求是各自独立的，不相关的，那么根据新的诉讼程序，就不存在严重的问题。我不知道什么职业适合我干。这件外衣不太适合你。我们两点钟见面，你方便吗?曼胡德为了方便自己作了这样的安排--从她的角度来说在经济上是最划算的。颜色、图案及质地的多样化足以使每一个人的需求和审美要求得到满足。要满足特定需求,您可以增加、删除甚至重新设定防火墙的配置选项。

translation: n. 夏季；全盛时期vi. 避暑；过夏天adj. 夏季的n. (Summer)人名；(德)祖默；(英)萨默
examples: We must use a canopy in summer.The stream is reduced to a mere trickle in summer.The congregation of sightseers increases in the summer.Summer vacation will come by and by.Some animals pass the summer in the sleepy state.We need more rain to get through the summer.
夏天必须使用遮阳伞。夏天那条小河的水量减少，成了涓涓溪流。夏季，旅游观光的人增加了。暑假很快就要来到。许多动物都是在睡眠状态中度过夏天的。我们需要更多的雨水去度过夏天。

translation: n. 太阳vt. 使晒vi. 晒太阳n. (Sun)人名；(中)孙(普通话·威妥玛)；(柬)孙；(缅)素；(土)松
examples: The earth goes round the sun.The sun rises in the east.They sat in the sun roasting themselves.The diamond shone with every hue under the sun.The sun shines brightly.The trees outside the window blocked off the sun.Because the sun is its central figure, the family of objects that accompanies it is called the solar system.Do you like to sun yourself on the beach?It is better for you to sun yourself more.They are sunning themselves on the beach.
地球绕着太阳运行。太阳从东方升起。他们坐着晒太阳。这颗钻石在阳光下显得色彩斑斓。阳光灿烂。窗外的树木挡住了阳光。因为太阳是它们的中心人物，所以，围绕着它的天体家族就叫做太阳系。你想去海滩晒太阳吗?多晒晒太阳对你有好处。他们在海滩上晒太阳。

translation: n. 星期日；礼拜日
examples: Sunday is the first day of the week.I bought a new fishing rod last Sunday.We're sold out of Sunday papers, sir.
星期日是一周的第一天。上星期日我新买了一个鱼竿。先生，星期日的报纸我们全卖光了。

translation: n. 太阳镜；凸透镜（sunglass的复数）
examples: Her eyes were masked by huge round sunglasses.I couldn't figure out who the lady with the sunglasses was.He used a piece of tissue to clean his sunglasses.Sunglasses are on the first floor.
她的双眼被一副圆形大墨镜遮住了。我想不出那位戴墨镜的夫人是谁。他用一张纸巾擦太阳镜。太阳镜在一层。

translation: adj. 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
examples: We basked ourselves on the sunny beach.Sunny weather alternated with rain.Sunny days are driving up the temperature.He is with good coordination and a sunny smile.
我们在阳光充足的海滩上晒太阳。天气晴雨相间。阳光明媚的日子使气温上升。他非常随和，一副春风得意的样子。

translation: n. 阳光；愉快；晴天；快活n. (Sunshine)人名；(英)森夏恩
examples: Dewdrops shine brightly in the sunshine.I saw her basking in the sunshine.The water soon evaporated in the sunshine.The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.I was sitting in the garden enjoying the sunshine.The baby has brought some sunshine into their life.We're expecting a spell of sunshine.We had twelve hours of sunshine yesterday, as against a forecast of continuous rain.
露珠在阳光下闪闪发光。我看到她在阳光下晒太阳。水在阳光下不久就蒸发了。许多花的花瓣在阳光中绽放。我坐在庭院里享受明媚的阳光。孩子给他们的生活带来了几分快乐。我们盼望晴朗的天气。昨日有十二小时的晴天，预报却说仍有雨。

translation: n. 超级市场；自助售货商店
examples: A variety of food is sold at a supermarket.The supermarket is just in the corner of the street.Another supermarket opened last week.He usually trades at the nearby supermarket.There is an underground car park near the supermarket.
超级市场各式各样的食物均有出售。超市就在街角。上星期又有一家超级市场开张了。他通常在附近的超市购物。这个超市附近有一个地下停车场。

translation: n. 晚餐，晚饭；夜宵
examples: He had some rice for supper.I came here immediately after having my supper.Have you had your supper?I'll just throw together a quick supper.I usually have a big supper.The remains of the supper were taken away.His wife made some pumpkin pies for supper.We had a buffet supper last evening.The church supper is the grandfather of the country club.
晚饭时他吃了一些米饭。我一吃完晚饭就来这里了。你吃过晚饭了吗？我马上做一顿简便的晚餐吧。我通常吃一顿丰富的晚餐。晚餐吃剩的东西被收去了。他妻子做了一些南瓜馅饼作晚餐。昨天晚上，我们吃了一次自助晚餐。教堂的晚餐聚会是乡间俱乐部的前身。

translation: vt. 假设；认为；让（虚拟语气）；推想vi. 猜想；料想conj. 假使…结果会怎样
examples: Suppose you have a thousand dollars, what will you do with it.Let us suppose another planet with conditions similar to those on the earth.Some religions suppose that there is a Heaven physically above the earth.I suppose we shall be having some sort of celebration for the bride.You are not suppose to stay home during the weekend.Suppose we dine together.I suppose he would be about fifty when he obtained a doctorate.
假设你有一千美元，你会用它做什么。让我们假定另外有一个具有和地球上相似条件的行星。一些宗教认为地球上面真有一个天国。我想我们还是来为新娘庆贺一番吧。你不应该周末还呆在家里。让我们一块儿吃饭吧我推测他获得博士学位时大概是五十岁左右。

translation: adj. 确信的；可靠的；必定的adv. 当然；的确n. (Sure)人名；(英)休尔
examples: I think you are not quite sure about it.I'm sure you'll want a go when you see it.I can't be sure, but I believe it worths trying.The news is sure to overset him.Hard work is a sure avenue to success.He's not so sure of himself these days.They had never seen her so sure of herself.It sure was a cold night.I had a feeling we'd get lost, and sure enough, we did.Nobody knows the cause of the fire for sure.
我认为,你们对这一点并不能完全肯定。我敢说你看到了就想试一下。我不能确定,但我确信这值得一试。这条消息必定会使他心神不安。勤奋是可靠的成功之道。他近来不大有自信。他们从未看见过她这样自信。的确是个寒冷的夜晚。我觉得我们迷路了,确实如此,我们迷路了。没有人确切地知道大火的原因。

translation: n. 惊奇，诧异；突然袭击vt. 使惊奇；奇袭adj. 令人惊讶的
examples: John turned around and looked at me in surprise.It was a great surprise to learn of her marriage.I tried to conceal my surprise when she said she was only 22.I must say the news came as a total surprise.The news greatly surprised them.It won't surprise me if they get married very soon.Put the presents out of sight so we can surprise her.It may surprise her greatly to know that Frank has come back from Paris.The army attacked at night to surprise the rebels.A teacher surprised the boys smoking cigarettes.
约翰转过身来,惊奇地望着我。得知她结婚是一件十分令人惊喜的事。当她说她只有22岁时,我尽力掩饰自己的惊讶。我得说这个消息来得太突然了。这消息使他们大为吃惊。即使他们很快就结婚,我也不会感到意外。把礼物藏起来,我们给她个惊喜。要是知道弗兰克从巴黎回来了,她会惊喜万分的。军队在夜间发起攻击，把反叛者打了个措手不及。一位老师惊讶地发现那些男孩子居然在抽烟。

translation: n. 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
examples: This woolen sweater may keep you warm in winter.She slipped into the sweater and dashed out of the door.He put on a thick sweater since it was cold in the morning.
这件羊毛衫在冬天可以保暖。她匆匆穿上毛衣, 冲出门去。早晨很冷，他穿上了一件厚毛衣。

translation: vt. 扫除；猛拉；掸去vi. 扫，打扫；席卷；扫视；袭击n. 打扫，扫除；范围；全胜
examples: He picked up the broom to help me sweep the floor.They asked the little boy to sweep the room clean.His fingers swept the keys of the piano.The breeze sweeps the crystal mirror of the pool.The soldier swept the forest with a telescope.A huge wave swept over the deck.He helplessly watched the wave sweep his cap away.He was the only man to sweep the diving gold medals in two consecutive Olympics.The boy helped his mother sweep away the dirt on the floor.We need to sweep all obstacles on our road to success.This floor needs a good sweep.The long sweep of the distant hills could just be seen.Her sweep of her audience along with her is really an amazing skill.He lost his life in the fierce sweep of the huge wave.The woman sat down at the river bank, enjoying the the sweep of the wind over the river.They are eager to get outside the sweep of the present authority.She gave a quick sweep of the crowd with her eyes.We got several first prizes in the sport meet, which was a clean sweep this time.

他拿起扫帚帮我扫地。他们叫那个小男孩把房间打扫干净。他的手指在钢琴键盘上轻快地移动。微风掠过清如明鉴的一泓池水。那个士兵用望远镜扫视树林。一股巨浪从甲板上卷了过去。他眼巴巴地看着帽子被海浪卷走了。他是唯一一个在连续两届奥林匹克运动会上摘得跳水金牌的选手。那个男孩帮助母亲清除尘土。我们要清除成功道路上的一切障碍。这地板需要好好清扫一下。连绵的远山依稀可见。她紧紧抓住听众心理的技巧真是令人赞叹。他被一阵疯狂的巨浪卷走,丢掉了性命。那个女人坐在河边,享受着轻拂过水面的风儿。他们急于脱离当前政权的控制范围。她用目光匆匆在人群中搜寻了一番。我们在运动会上得了好几个第一名,这次是大胜了。

translation: adj. 甜的；悦耳的；芳香的；亲切的n. 糖果；乐趣；芳香；宝贝（俚）酷毙了n. (Sweet)人名；(英)斯威特
examples: Do you like sweet or dry sherry?The dish tastes a bit sweet.Don't the roses smell sweet!The soprano's voice sounded clear and sweet.I saw Jim with a really sweet girl in the cinema last night.You can have some more sweet.The dentist told the boy not to eat too many sweets.
你喜欢甜的还是不甜的雪利酒?这菜有点儿甜味。这玫瑰花真香!那女高音歌手的嗓音响亮而动听。昨天晚上我在电影院里看到吉姆和一个很漂亮的女孩子在一起。你可以再吃点儿甜食。牙医告诫这男孩不要吃太多糖果。

translation: vi. 游泳；漂浮；浸；眩晕vt. 游过；使浮起n. 游泳；漂浮；眩晕adj. 游泳时穿戴的
examples: Let's go swimming.She's teaching the children to swim.I used to swim all the year round.I like to swim, but I'm not a very good swimmer.He went down to the beach for a swim.On a hot day, a cool swim is a joy.After her swim she dried herself with a towel.
咱们游泳去。她正在教孩子们游泳。过去我一年四季都游泳。我喜欢游泳，可是我游得并不好。他去海滩游泳了。大热天来次凉快的游泳是件乐事。游泳后，她用毛巾擦干身子。

translation: 许多，大量
examples: Scores of livestock and other animals died from the oily mist, their lungs blackened by the liquid.Outside the hockey stadium scores of Scott Brown supporters, muffled against the snow and stamping in the cold, wait for their own would-be senator to arrive.
大量的牲畜和其它动物因石油烟雾而死，它们的肺部充满了黑色的液体。在曲棍球露天体育场外，许多斯科特•布朗的支持者冒着严寒，在冷风中瑟瑟发抖地等待着他们心中的议员到临。

translation: 卖完；卖光
examples: The books you ask for are all sold out.Sorry, we've sold out of shirts in your size.He sold out to ambition and the desire for wealth.He was sold out by a traitor and arrested.We would rather die than sell out our comrades.
你要的书都卖完了。对不起，你这样尺寸的衬衣都卖完了。他为财富而背叛了自己的抱负和志愿。他被叛徒出卖，被捕了。我们宁死也不出卖自己的同志。

translation: 召唤，派人去叫；派人去拿
examples: I went in search of a doctor for my sick wife.Let's invite them over for a drink.Half an hour later Kutuzov sent for Prince Andrey.I can still hear your perpetual calling for me.
我去请医生为妻子看病。咱们去请他们过来喝一杯。半小时后，安德烈公爵又被召唤到库图佐夫那儿。我仍旧听得见她那永恒的召唤。

translation: 发送；派遣；放出
examples: Many churches used to send missionaries to China.We'll send more mobile medical teams to work in the countryside.Send these orders down to our branch office.How much is it to send this parcel by air mail?Two cotyledons have come out from the seedling.The trees send forth many branches.
之前有许多教会曾派遣传教士去中国。我们将派遣更多巡回医疗队到农村去。把这些订货单发送到我们的分店。欲通过航寄发送这小包需要多少钱？小苗长出了两片子叶。树长出很多枝。

translation: 射出；使上升；长出；检举；提出；判决入狱
examples: They planned to send a rocket to the moon.Space rockets are being sent up all the time.He was sent up the river for a bank robbery.You'll land up in jail if you aren't careful.
他们计划向月球发射火箭。现在随时都有火箭发射。他因抢劫银行而被捕入狱。如果你不小心的话，你就得落得个入狱的下场。

translation: 放下；记下；看做；确定
examples: He jotted down the conceits of his idle hours.Make sure that you put down every word she says.Write down your address at the check back please.He jotted down a note for her and then left.The teacher asked the pupil to put his hand down.Susan laid the infant down for a nap.We have been booked down for the next ship.Let's go down to the reception desk Register.We have set the date for the wedding.You must pin down every quotation to its author.The bus driver set her down at the cornet.Can you put him down at the next corner?I set a high value on his advice.I don't think you should go down there.You may set his silence down to his shyness.I put it all down to her hard work and initiative.Uncle Wang put the plough down in a field.At sunset, the sun looks as if it is going down.

他记下了闲暇时想到的一些看法。切实要记下她说的每一个字。请在支票背面写下你的地址。他匆匆为她写下了一个条子然后离开了。老师叫这个小学生把手放下。苏珊把婴儿放下让她睡觉。我们已被登记乘下一班轮船。我们下楼到前台登记。我们已经确定了婚期。你一定要确定每一个引文的作者是谁。公共汽车司机在转弯处停下来让她下车。你能在下一个拐角处让他下车吗？我认为他的忠告很有价值。我认为你不应该去那儿。你可以把他的沉默归因于羞怯。我把这一切归因于她工作又勤奋又主动。王伯伯把犁降落在田地里了。日落时，太阳看起来好像在降落。

translation: v. 释放；使获得自由
examples: The prisoner had hopes that he might be set free.This metal acts on water to set hydrogen free.
这个囚犯希望能获得释放。这种金属作用于水，就释放了氢气。

translation: v. 出发；引起；动身；使爆炸；抵销；分开
examples: If you want to catch that train we'd better set off for the station immediately.What time are you planning to set off tomorrow?They've set off on a journey round the world.He'll have to circle the mark for 360°more before he can set himself free.That jumper sets off the blue of her eyes.He set these heavy expenses off against his increase in salary.Do be careful with those fireworks; the slightest spark could set them off.The first atom bomb was set off over Hiroshima.The burning gas was easy to set off an explosion.
你要是想赶上那班火车，咱们就最好马上动身去火车站。你打算明天几点钟启程?他们已经开始环游世界。他就得多绕航标360°才能解脱。在这件毛衣衬托下，她眼睛的蓝色显得更漂亮了。他的这些沉重的开销抵消了增加的工资。这些烟火要格外小心，稍有火星就能引起爆炸。第一颗原子弹是在广岛上空爆炸的。燃烧的煤气容易引起爆炸。

translation: 出发；开始；陈述；陈列
examples: Her work is always very well set out.She set out the reasons for her resignation in a long letter.She set out the pieces on the chess-board.We set out with enough provisions.He joyfully consented and we set out.They set out on the last stage of their journey.
她的工作总是很有条理。她在一封长信里阐明了辞职原因。她把国际象棋的棋子摆在棋盘上了。我们带上足够的食品出发了。他欣然同意，我们就出发了。他们开始了旅行的最后一程。

translation: 炫耀；卖弄
examples: He likes to show off his masculine physique.The exercise was intended as a show of force.His show-off only serves to show up his ignorance.Stop showing off in front of everybody.
他喜欢炫耀他的阳刚之气。这次演习为的是炫耀武力。他的卖弄只不过暴露了他自己的无知。别再在大伙跟前卖弄了。

translation: 并肩；一起；并排
examples: The couple walked side by side on the pavement.We must stand side by side in our days of trouble.They were thrown together by a common interest.This challenge is compounded by the population time bomb.
这一对儿肩并肩地走在人行道上。在困难的日子里我们一定要肩并肩地站在一起。共同的兴趣使他们走到了一起。这种挑战和人口这颗定时炸弹结合到一起了。

translation: 以便；以致
examples: I gave him money to be quit of him.We went to school so as to have a meeting.She held onto a strap to steady herself.He ran quickly so as to catch the last bus.
我给了他钱为的是要摆脱他。我们到学校为的是开会。她抓住拉手吊带以便站稳。他跑得很快以便赶上那末班车。

translation: 到目前为止，迄今为止
examples: The bus route goes so far as that, so you'll need to take a taxi.So far I haven't heard of anybody who wants stop living on account of the cost.I am resolved to try story-writing but so far have not made a start.The scientist is doing experiments no one has so far attempted.It's the hottest day I've had so far.I agree up to a point, but things are not so easy.I don't know how far to rely on him.You can trust him only so far and no further.
汽车路线到此为止了，你得叫辆的士。迄今为止，我从未听说过有人因生活费过昂而不要生存下去的。我下决心试试小说写作，不过迄今为止还没开始。科学家们正在作一项迄今为止没人做过的实验。这是迄今为止我经历的最热的一天。在一定程度上我同意，但事情并不那么容易。我不知道应该依靠他到什么程度。你只能相信他到这个程度为止，不能再进一步了。

translation: 只要；就…而言；在…范围内
examples: It is no exertion to him to do so.What he says is true as far as it goes.I don't know how far to rely on him.You can trust him only so far and no further.
这样做对他而言并不费力。他的话就其本身而言是对的。我不知道应该依靠他到什么程度。你只能相信他到这个程度为止，不能再进一步了。

translation: adv. 只要
examples: There is hope so long as he is with us.I do not mind as long as it does not rain.
只要他在就有希望。只要不下雨就行了。

translation: 迟早，早晚
examples: He will marry the girl first or last.You will leave your parents sooner or later.
他迟早会娶那姑娘的。你迟早会离开父母的。

translation: 加速；使加速
examples: Harden up a little, we need more speed.As we came onto the open road we gathered speed.
把帆索拉紧一点，我们需要加快速度。到达大路后，我们逐渐加快速度。

translation: 代表；支持；象征；担任…的候选人
examples: My assistant will stand in for me while I'm away.I condemn fascism and all it stands for.What did Kenai's totem stand for?I won't stand for his insults any longer.
我不在的时候我的助手将代表我处理事务。我谴责法西斯主义及其代表的一切。可奈的图腾象征着什么?我再不能容忍他的污辱了。

translation: 停止做；停下正在做的事情；停止正在或经常做的事
examples: Let's stop doing it for the present.It simply means to stop doing any worldly work!
我们暂时停一下工作。停下做世俗的工作的意思。

translation: 与…作斗争，和…斗争
examples: The soldiers moving through the area had to struggle against the bad weather, which could render the primitive roads impassable.As the parents had five children, life was a perpetual struggle against poverty."Reading this book, we can identify with the main character's struggle against evil."
士兵们在穿越那一地带时，必须与恶劣气候抗争，因为恶劣气候可能使得那些原始的道路让人无法通行。由于父母已经有了五个孩子，生活就是同贫困作无止境的搏斗。＂读了这本书，我们会对主人翁反对邪恶的斗争寄予同情。＂

translation: 比如；诸如
examples: I know many of them, such as John, Peter, and Tom.We have different pies, such as apple, cherry, and strawberry pies.In this paragraph there are many nouns, such as boy, girl, and book.The Roman languages such as French, Italian, are all derived from Latin.Such things as money and fame are not long lasting.It's more useful to learn modern languages, such as English and German, than Latin.
我认识他们当中的很多人，例如约翰、彼得和汤姆。我们有不同的派，例如苹果、樱桃和草莓派。这一段里面有很多名词，例如男孩、女孩和书本。拉丁语系，例如法语，意大利语，都起源于拉丁语。诸如钱财和荣誉之类的东西，是不会持久的。学习英语和德语等现代语言比学习拉丁语更为有用。
